ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your belongings you left behind in your room when you decided to turn against the Underground Railroad, are available in your old room.
Get em and split.
Player.moveto MyOldRoomRef
When done collecting your stuff.
Player.moveto UROutsideRef
ESP.TRADUIT:
当你决定反对时，你留在房间里的物品 地下铁路，可在您的旧房间使用。
得到他们并分裂。
Player.moveto MyOldRoomRef
收集完你的东西后。
Player.moveto UROutsideRef

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey John- here's the waiting list for 326, as promised. Good thing we're guaranteed a spot, this is one hell of a list.
1) Turner, Josh & Phyllis 2) Stephenson, Barbara 3) Darr, Nicolas 4) Hodgeman, Tim 5) Cratchner, Marie & Robert 6) Combs, Jack 7) Houck, Elijah 8) Schroeder, Al x 9) D pper, Adam 10) Roth an, J ckso 11) D nni , Ma g 1 ) fi , 1 er g
<<ERROR: DATA CORRUPTED. CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR.>>
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，约翰——这是 326 的等候名单，正如承诺的那样。好在我们保证了一个位置，这是一个地狱般的名单。 1) Turner, Josh & Phyllis 2) Stephenson, Barbara 3) Darr, Nicolas 4) Hodgeman, Tim 5) Cratchner, Marie & Robert 6) Combs, Jack 7) Houck, Elijah 8) Schroeder, Al x 9) D pper, Adam 10) Roth an, J ckso 11) D nni , Ma g 1 ) fi , 1 er g
<<错误：数据损坏。联系管理员。>>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey John- Did you ever order those extra tables? We only have two, and that's not near enough. Make sure you contact Vault-Tec within the next few days, Janis has been on my ass about it for the past week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，约翰——你有没有点过那些额外的桌子？我们只有两个，这还不够。确保你在接下来的几天内联系 Vault-Tec，Janis 过去一周一直在担心我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey again, I was just gonna let you know Vault-Tec announced it's servers would be shutting down on October 26th. That's only a week from now, so make sure to back up anything worth saving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我只是想让你知道 Vault-Tec 宣布它的服务器将于 10 月 26 日关闭。从现在开始只有一周的时间，所以一定要备份任何值得保存的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just don't know about some of the people we have holed up in here. Take that Jared guy, for instance- why the hell does he always carry around that knife? Always sneaking around like he's about to stab one of us in the back. If he pulls one stunt, I'll be handing him his arms on the way out the door. And what's with that druggie? He kind of just wandered in here, no one had ever seen him around Alton before. Seems like a nice enough guy when he's not high on Jet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是不知道我们躲在这里的一些人。以贾里德那个家伙为例——他为什么总是随身携带那把刀？总是偷偷摸摸，好像他要在我们背后捅一刀一样。如果他有一个特技，我会在出门的路上把他的手臂递给他。 那个吸毒者是怎么回事？他只是在这里闲逛，以前没有人在奥尔顿附近见过他。当他对 Jet 不高时，他似乎是一个足够好的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackpot! Stumbled upon an old Midwestern Brotherhood of Steel bunker today, me and my search party are going to clean it out later. Looks like it hasn't been used in years... why would they be stationed in Alton in the first place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大奖！今天偶然发现了一个古老的中西部钢铁兄弟会地堡，我和我的搜索队稍后会清理它。貌似好多年没用了……他们当初为什么要驻扎在奥尔顿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Amazing discovery today- found an old minigun in one of the labs. A holotape I found nearby said it was an experimental project called "Mutilator." Apparently it was developed by some of the higher-ups of the Brotherhood. I'll be keeping this one for a while- along with its original housing to keep it secure. On a side note, we heard some weird scraping noises down the hall. I'll make sure to bring this baby when we go back tomorrow, just in case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天惊人的发现——在一个实验室里发现了一把旧的迷你枪。我在附近找到的一个全息磁带说这是一个名为“Mutilator”的实验项目。显然，它是由兄弟会的一些高层开发的。我将把这个和它原来的外壳一起保存一段时间，以保证它的安全。 顺便说一句，我们在大厅里听到了一些奇怪的刮擦声。明天我们回去的时候，我一定会带上这个孩子，以防万一。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Today's sweep was a complete disaster. I lost half my team to these... monsters. I don't know what they are, and I don't care. All I know is they were huge- twice the size of a man- and fast. Only 4 of us got out and we definitely aren't going back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天的扫荡是一场彻头彻尾的灾难。我失去了一半的团队给这些……怪物。我不知道他们是什么，我不在乎。我所知道的是它们很大——是人的两倍——而且速度很快。我们只有4个人出去了，我们绝对不会回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I'll forget, so the password is "headshot."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我会忘记，所以密码是“headshot”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I paid you your goddamn caps, and guess what- Hartrick's still here. I swear, if he's not gone by next week you'll regret it. And trust me, I'll be taking a hell of a lot more than just my caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我付了你该死的瓶盖，你猜怎么着——哈特里克还在这里。我发誓，如果他下周没有离开，你会后悔的。相信我，我会得到比我的瓶盖更多的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Generating LOD meshes may take as long as 10 hours. Are you sure you want to do it now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 生成 LOD 网格可能需要长达 10 小时。你确定要现在做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
<Converting to text...> ... <Done> Is this thing on? My name is Dr. Stephen M. Russell, a surgeon at the Childrens' Hospital in St. Louis, Missouri.
St. Louis isn't safe anymore; I'm heading up north towards Alton.
My colleagues are after me. One even attempted to drug me at work. They want the spot I reserved in the local vault, but they're not getting it. I think I know a safe place to hide for the time being; an old colleague that lives in the dwelling south of Vault 59.
I pray they don't find me.
Doc Russell, September 29 2077
ESP.TRADUIT:
<正在转换为文本...> ... <完成> 有这玩意吗？我是密苏里州圣路易斯儿童医院的外科医生 Stephen M. Russell 医生。
圣路易斯不再安全了。我正向北前往奥尔顿。
我的同事在追我。甚至有人试图在工作中给我下药。他们想要我在当地保险库中保留的位置，但他们没有得到。我想我知道一个安全的地方可以暂时躲起来；一位住在 59 号避难所南部住宅的老同事。
我祈祷他们不要找到我。
罗素博士，2077 年 9 月 29 日

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, traveler. If you're reading this note, you've already restored power to the Metro Station- only to find it near empty. You have our sincere thanks, we've been needing to do that for a while. Since you have been so helpful, you've been granted full citizenship to the best town in the Alton Wastes- Godfrey. You're welcome any time, just follow this road to the north- we're right by the old Super Duper Mart. Again, thank you for your help. Please visit soon.
Sincerely, George Houck
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，旅行者。 如果您正在阅读本说明，您已经恢复了地铁站的供电——只是发现它几乎是空的。我们衷心感谢您，我们已经需要这样做一段时间了。既然你如此乐于助人，你就获得了奥尔顿废土最好的城镇——戈弗雷的完全公民身份。随时欢迎您，沿着这条路往北走——我们就在旧的 Super Duper Mart 旁边。再次感谢您的帮助。请尽快访问。
真挚地， 乔治·霍克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, traveler. If you're reading this note, we'd like to congratulate you on surviving the crash of your airplane. You've landed in Alton- a city in what was the state of Illinois. Most of it's a shithole- but an unexplored shithole at that. You're free to wander the wastes of Alton as you please. But if you want a place to stay, away from the beasts that wander the old town, we have a proposition. Find a way to restore power to the Metro Station by the river, and you will be granted citizenship to our small community. We recommend checking out the utility tunnel in the parking lot of the hospital. Good luck, friend.
Sincerely, George Houck
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，旅行者。 如果您正在阅读本说明，我们要祝贺您在飞机坠毁事故中幸存下来。你降落在奥尔顿——伊利诺伊州的一座城市。大部分都是一个粪坑——但那是一个未开发的粪坑。你可以随心所欲地在奥尔顿的荒地中游荡。但如果你想找个地方住，远离那些在老城里游荡的野兽，我们有一个提议。想办法恢复河边地铁站的供电，您将获得我们这个小社区的公民身份。我们建议检查医院停车场的公用隧道。祝你好运，朋友。
真挚地， 乔治·霍克

ESP.ORIGINAL: As requested, the Brotherhood of Steel threat in the Alton has been eliminated. We released a controlled group of <unintelligible> into the bunker, and no Brotherhood patrols have been seen since. This is a major step towards a communist United States!
ESP.TRADUIT: 按照要求，奥尔顿钢铁兄弟会的威胁已被消除。我们将一组受控的<无法理解>释放到掩体中，此后再也没有看到兄弟会巡逻。这是迈向共产主义美国的重要一步！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Room 124 is to be subjected to approximately 50 rads of background radiation. Piles of toxic waste have been sealed off in a separate room adjacent to room 124. This is to test man's ability to survive the intense radiation that will plague the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 房间 124 将受到大约 50 拉德的背景辐射。成堆的有毒废物已被密封在与 124 号房间相邻的单独房间中。这是为了测试人类在将困扰世界的强烈辐射中生存的能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both patient 1 and patient 2, after being exposed to intense radiation, died after only one hour. Severe burns covered over 75% of their bodies, especially in facial areas. Patient 3, however, went into intense spasms until approximately 3 hours of radiation poisoning. Patient 3 was concluded to be dead 3 hours and 15 minutes after initial exposure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 患者 1 和患者 2 在暴露于强辐射后仅一小时后死亡。严重烧伤覆盖了他们身体的 75% 以上，尤其是面部区域。然而，患者 3 进入剧烈痉挛状态，直到大约 3 小时的辐射中毒。患者 3 在初次接触后 3 小时 15 分钟被判定死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Room 125 is to be filled with burn piles, which are to be lit on fire. These are to test man's ability to survive the imminent flames that will engulf the Earth within the coming months.
ESP.TRADUIT: 125 号房间将堆满烧焦的堆，它们将被点燃。这些是为了测试人类在未来几个月内将席卷地球的迫在眉睫的火焰中生存的能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient 1, after being locked in the smoke filled room, passed out 8 minutes after the fire was lit. Patient 1 was concluded to be dead after 10 minutes of smoke exposure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 患者 1 被锁在烟雾弥漫的房间后，在火被点燃 8 分钟后昏倒了。患者 1 在暴露于烟雾 10 分钟后被判定死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient 1, in room 126, is to be directed to run around in circles while under heavy dosages of laughing gas. Fragmentation grenades are to be dropped from the ceiling. This is to see how long a man can avoid overhead bombing while in a contained environment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 126 号病房的患者 1 将被指示在大量笑气下绕圈跑。破片手榴弹将从天花板上掉落。这是为了看看一个人在封闭环境中可以避免头顶轰炸多长时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient 1 ran as directed, and was hit directly on the top of the skull by a fragmentation grenade 3 and a half seconds into testing. He was killed immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 患者 1 按照指示奔跑，并在测试开始 3 秒半时被一枚破片手榴弹直接击中颅骨顶部。他立即被杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now this is something to watch! We've successfully increased the rate of fire and velocity of the shells without over heating the weapon! I'm going to log Project Mutilator as a success, and request it for general Paladin use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这是值得关注的事情！我们已经成功地提高了炮弹的射速和速度，而不会使武器过热！我打算将 Project Mutilator 记录为成功，并请求将它用于一般的 Paladin 使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a new project- "Mutilator" aims to increase the rate of fire and shell velocity while not increasing the spread of bullets. The main issue is overheating issues, and we've had more than one shells explode in the barrel. We've got a whole team working on it day and night, and progress is moving fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个新项目——“Mutilator”旨在提高射速和炮弹速度，同时不增加子弹的传播。主要问题是过热问题，我们有不止一颗炮弹在枪管中爆炸。我们有一个完整的团队日以继夜地工作，进展很快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One month. One month is all we give them. The Railroad will fall by our hands, just as the others have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个月。一个月是我们给他们的全部时间。就像其他人一样，铁路将在我们手中倒下。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
<Converting to text...> ... <Done> [STATIC] Alton is not as safe as I thought.
I'm hiding out here in this house, thanks to my colleague, Sarah. Sarah is a production foreman at the Nuka-Cola plant in Grafton, just to the west of Alton. The plant owner built this house for C-level employees; she had to convince her boss to let me stay here as long as I pull my weight around the house.
They want to get one last shipment out before... well, I don't really know what. Someone's got to know something about why all these vaults are conveniently sending out vouchers at the same time.
I saw one of my former colleagues, his name is Robert, asking around earlier. He even walked right past me, but luckily I was hiding in a closet when he did. I'll have to move on; luckily I know some people in Godfrey, a small town near--
Oh, shit, I have to get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT:
<正在转换为文本...> ... <完成> [静止的] 奥尔顿并不像我想象的那么安全。
感谢我的同事莎拉，我躲在这所房子里。莎拉是位于奥尔顿西部格拉夫顿的核子可乐工厂的生产工头。厂主为C级员工建造了这座房子；她必须说服她的老板让我留在这里，只要我在房子周围全力以赴。
他们想在之前发出最后一批货物……好吧，我真的不知道是什么。有人必须知道为什么所有这些保险库都方便地同时发送代金券。
我看到我以前的一位同事，他的名字叫罗伯特，早些时候在四处打听。他甚至直接从我身边走过，但幸运的是，当他走过时，我正躲在壁橱里。我必须继续前进；幸运的是，我在戈弗雷认识一些人，附近的一个小镇——
哦，该死的，我必须离开这里！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
<Converting to text...> ... <Done> Dead. My friends are dead. My family is dead. Doctor Stephen M. Russell of St. Louis Children's Hospital is dead. But I am alive. I do as master says. Master tells me to stay. I stay. Master tells me to sit. I sit. Master tells me to play dead. I'm good at playing dead, Master says. Master tells me to fetch. But what to fetch? WHAT DO I FETCH? But I learn what to fetch. I here the footsteps approach. They like the light, the flashing, bright light. They come to me, and I fetch. I bring them to Master. Master is happy.
I like to make Master happy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
<正在转换为文本...> ... <完成> 死的。 我的朋友都死了。 我的家人已经死了。 圣路易斯儿童医院的斯蒂芬·M·拉塞尔医生已经去世。 但我还活着。 我照师傅说的做。 师父叫我留下。 我留下。 师父叫我坐下。 是吗。 师父叫我装死。 师父说，我擅长装死。 师父叫我去取。 但是要拿什么？ 我要获取什么？ 但我知道要拿什么。我这里脚步声逼近。他们喜欢光，闪烁的，明亮的光。他们来找我，我去取。我把它们带给师父。师父很高兴。
我喜欢让师父开心。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
<Converting to text...> ... <Done> Thank God I got out of there in time.
Sarah wound up dead... not just dead, her body was mutilated.
How could my colleagues, my former friends, do this?
This is so unbelievably messed up... why are they pursuing me like this? Over a Vault voucher? What is going on here?
This pump station is doing something to me... radiation? My hair's falling out, I've thrown up at least a dozen times already... I can barely think with this damned headache.
I have to find the source of this radiation. The canyon to the northeast is a known dumping ground of toxic waste; maybe the waste is leaking into the ground water and driving people mad. I might find my answers there.
ESP.TRADUIT:
<正在转换为文本...> ... <完成> 感谢上帝，我及时离开了那里。
莎拉死了……不仅死了，她的身体也被肢解了。
我的同事，我以前的朋友，怎么会这样做呢？
简直乱成一团……他们为什么要这样追我？在保险柜凭证上？这里发生了什么？
这个泵站对我做了什么……辐射？我的头发掉光了，我已经吐了至少十几次了……这该死的头痛让我几乎无法思考。
我必须找到这种辐射的来源。东北部的峡谷是众所周知的有毒废物倾倒场。也许废物正在泄漏到地下水中，使人们发疯。我可能会在那里找到我的答案。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear self,
Make sure you remember to make contraption that will wow the world. Items should be included in your suitcase.
Step 1) Stab pencil in basketball Step 2) Tie pencil across middle of stabbed pencil with one string of surgical tubing. Step 3) Tie 2 other pencils on eraser end of stabbed pencil like an upside down V. Step 4) Show the world your stick figure with a ridiculously large head.
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的自己，
确保你记得制造让世界惊叹的装置。物品应包含在您的手提箱中。
步骤 1) 铅笔刺在篮球中 步骤 2) 用一串手术管将铅笔系在被刺过的铅笔中间。 步骤 3) 将另外 2 支铅笔系在被刺铅笔的橡皮末端上，就像一个倒置的 V 形。 第 4 步）向世界展示你的简笔画，头大得离谱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Hartrick- We're getting word from traders that Plague soldiers have been seen coming in and out of that crater by the grain silo. Better watch the entrance to the parking garage, it spits out near there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿哈特里克- 我们从商人那里得到消息，有人看到瘟疫士兵在谷仓旁进出那个火山口。最好注意停车场的入口，它会在附近吐出。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
IRC LOG 7/16/
16:53 Bladez0fFury Guess what lvl i am in Fo3 16:53 Quincy_Jones 30 16:53 ARLINDER Hey, Could someone say my name? I want to test something. 16:53 Bladez0fFury no 16:53 ElijahHouck I'll just look at the script from the beginning of the game 16:53 Bladez0fFury Arlinder 16:53 ElijahHouck ARLINDER 16:53 Darkghost lol I'm lvl 3.. 16:53 Tahkayun Gaylord 16:53 Quincy_Jones kool 16:54 ARLINDER Hmm......... 16:54 ElijahHouck @Tahk: HA! 16:54 Tahkayun I mean, ARLINDER 16:54 c2552 lvl 3? 16:54 Darkghost damn FWE.... 16:54 Quincy_Jones im lvl 10 in oblivion 16:54 Bladez0fFury Im lvl 133 xD 16:54 ARLINDER Damn. 16:54 Tahkayun *high fives Elijah* 16:54 Darkghost hey 16:54 ElijahHouck *moves hand quickly out of the way*
END OF LOG
ESP.TRADUIT:
IRC LOG 7/16/
16:53 Bladez0fFury 猜猜我在Fo3是什么等级 16:53 Quincy_Jones 30 16:53 ARLINDER 嘿，有人能说出我的名字吗？我想测试一些东西。 16:53 Bladez0fFury 不 16:53 ElijahHouck 我只看游戏一开始的剧本 16:53 Bladez0fFury Arlinder 16:53 ElijahHouck ARLINDER 16:53 Darkghost LoL 我是lvl 3.. 16:53 Tahkayun 天呀! 16:53 Quincy_Jones kool 16:54 ARLINDER Hmm......... 16:54 ElijahHouck @Tahk: HA! 16:54 Tahkayun I mean, ARLINDER 16:54 c2552 lvl 3? 16:54 Darkghost damn FWE.... 16:54 Quincy_Jones im lvl 10 in oblivion 16:54 Bladez0fFury Im lvl 133 xD 16:54 ARLINDER Damn. 16:54 Tahkayun *high fives Elijah* 16:54 Darkghost hey 16:54 ElijahHouck *快速移开手*
END OF LOG

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey Stephen- It seems the bombs are inescapable. Like we've discussed before, take your family to the caves near West Elementary. We're leaving as we write this final letter. Hope to see you.
Sincerely, Dick Dithers
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿斯蒂芬- 炸弹似乎是不可避免的。就像我们之前讨论过的，带你的家人去韦斯特小学附近的洞穴。我们在写这最后一封信的时候就要离开了。希望能看到你。
真挚地， 迪克·迪瑟斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
<ERROR> COULD NOT CONNECT TO SERVER HOSTNAME: servdullesair ERROR CODE: 11041
PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR
ESP.TRADUIT:
<错误> 无法连接到服务器 主机名：servdullesair 错误代码：11041
请联系管理员

ESP.ORIGINAL: Connection established [BOS_WEST_SERV] Receiving data... ... Copying 100013.MP13... ... ... ... ... ... Connection interrupted ... ... ... END OF TRANSMISSION
ESP.TRADUIT: 已建立连接 [BOS_WEST_SERV] 接收数据... ... 正在复制 100013. MP13... ... ... ... ... ... 连接中断 ... ... ... 传输结束

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we're picking up some weird transmissions. From the sounds of it, it could be coming all the way from the west coast. We haven't received one of these in a long time. This could be serious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来我们正在接收一些奇怪的传输。从它的声音来看，它可能是从西海岸一路传来的。我们已经很久没有收到其中之一了。这可能很严重。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The plane's not ready yet. I'm not sure the engines will be able to take that much stress after all of these years! The power's back online, but I don't think she's structurally sound! We can't go, it's too risky.
If you send us on this mission, there's a good chance we aren't coming back- let alone make it to California.
ESP.TRADUIT:
飞机还没准备好。我不确定这些年来引擎能否承受这么大的压力！权力重新上线，但我认为她的结构并不健全！我们不能去，太危险了。
如果你派我们去执行这个任务，我们很有可能不会回来——更不用说去加利福尼亚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a shit about the risks. We have to help them- we all know Lyons won't. Regardless of what those spineless bastards holed up in the Pentagon say, we ARE the Brotherhood. We'll help our brothers, no matter what the odds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对风险不屑一顾。我们必须帮助他们——我们都知道里昂不会。 不管躲在五角大楼的那些没骨气的混蛋怎么说，我们都是兄弟会。我们会帮助我们的兄弟，不管有什么困难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To start the boiler back up, Tom Howard says I'll need some scrap metal, two bottles of Wonderglue, and a lead pipe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要重新启动锅炉，汤姆霍华德说我需要一些废金属、两瓶 神奇胶水 和一根铅管。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Genesis 1
In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth. And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters. And God said, Let there be light: and there was light. And God saw the light, that it was good: and God divided the light from the darkness. And God called the light Day, and the darkness he called Night. And the evening and the morning were the first day.
ESP.TRADUIT:
创世记 1
起初，上帝创造了天地。 大地空虚混沌；黑暗笼罩着深渊。上帝的灵在水面上运行。 神说，要有光，就有了光。 神看光是好的，就把光暗分开了。 上帝称光为昼，称黑暗为夜。晚上和早晨是第一天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are to investigate the cause of The Divide. You have been equipped with special radiation-resistant Power Armor to help fend off the high levels of radiation that have been reported. Transmit any information found over the refitted Enclave tower- any operational questions are answered in the operations manual. Return with any technology that could benefit the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要调查鸿沟的原因。你已经配备了特殊的抗辐射动力装甲，以帮助抵御已报告的高水平辐射。传输在改装后的 Enclave 塔上发现的任何信息——任何操作问题都在操作手册中得到解答。带着任何可以使兄弟会受益的技术回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
RE: "John, we just got a spot in the Austin vault and will be there as soon as possible.
Barbara"
Can't wait to see you- have a safe drive over here.
John
ESP.TRADUIT:
RE：“约翰，我们刚刚在奥斯汀金库中找到了一个位置，并且会尽快到达那里。
芭芭拉”
迫不及待地想见到你-在这里安全驾驶。
约翰

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buried that whiney... what was his name, Hawthorne? Anyway, he's in the second grave to the north. Glad to finally get rid of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埋葬了那个哀嚎……他叫什么名字，霍桑？不管怎样，他在北边的第二个坟墓里。很高兴终于摆脱了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To anyone in the Godfrey area-
Our scouting teams reported back after a week long expedition and have spotted multiple Super Mutant camps within a mile of the city of Godfrey. We advise all security personal to be on high alert and keep a constant watch on the perimeter. We have ordered for all trading posts and shops outside the city walls to be shut down. Traders will be informed as they pass through, and we will provide shelter for them if necessary.
Why the creatures are even in the area is unknown at this time- they haven't been spotted in decades. The fact still stands, however, that they are very real threat, especially in these numbers. If an attack occurs, we will do all we can to protect the city. If defeat is deemed unavoidable, we will fight our way out of the city and to the north. Be prepared and begin packing a single suitcase of what you think is essential... just in case.
Stay strong, people of Godfrey.
Robert Johnson
ESP.TRADUIT:
对于戈弗雷地区的任何人——
我们的侦察队在为期一周的探险后报告回来，并在戈弗雷市一英里范围内发现了多个超级变种人营地。我们建议所有安全人员保持高度警惕，并在周边时刻保持警惕。我们已下令关闭城墙外的所有贸易站和商店。贸易商在经过时会收到通知，如有必要，我们将为他们提供庇护。
目前尚不清楚这些生物为何会出现在该地区——它们已经有几十年没有被发现了。然而，事实仍然是，它们是非常真实的威胁，尤其是在这些数字上。如果发生袭击，我们将尽我们所能保护城市。如果认为失败是不可避免的，我们将出城，向北杀出一条血路。做好准备，开始打包一个你认为必不可少的手提箱……以防万一。
保持坚强，戈弗雷的人。
罗伯特·约翰逊

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Linda,
If you find this note, it means I'm already dead. As I write this, I'm holed up in the South Godfrey Metro Station. I can hear the Ghouls getting closer. I'm going to try to flood one of the passages, but that will only draw the Ghouls towards me. At least I'll die blowing the shit out of some Ghouls, though.
Anyways, fuck you.
Lots of love,
Josh Roberts
ESP.TRADUIT:
琳达，
如果你找到这张纸条，就意味着我已经死了。当我写这篇文章时，我躲在南戈弗雷地铁站。我能听到食尸鬼越来越近了。我将尝试淹没其中一个通道，但这只会将食尸鬼拉向我。不过，至少我会因为一些食尸鬼的狗屎而死。
总之，去你妈的。
满满的爱，
乔什·罗伯茨

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To anyone who may use this terminal-
Finally got the terminal working! I simply extracted the code from the control pod on the outside of the Vault, compiled it so it's useable in the terminal's OS, ran a few wires through to the main breaker, and presto!
For any operating errors, please let me know so I can get them working as soon as possible. I don't want to be trapped down here again.
Tom Johnson
ESP.TRADUIT:
对于任何可能使用此终端的人-
终于让终端正常工作了！我只是从 Vault 外部的控制盒中提取代码，对其进行编译，使其可在终端的操作系统中使用，然后将几根电线连接到主断路器，然后就可以了！
对于任何操作错误，请告诉我，以便我尽快让它们工作。我不想再被困在这里。
汤姆·约翰逊

ESP.ORIGINAL: RobcOS v.85 (C)2076 RobCo ======================== | User Log: | >> Administrator (RobCoID 2398-H) | >> New_Admin: HARTRICK_001 | Welcome new user, HARTRICK_001 | >> New_Targeting_Param: | >>> HARTRICK_001_userGroup ========================

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Shit... experiment went wrong. Obeying orders and abandoning the bunker. I suggested to the Colonel that we destroy the place with the stash of C-4 left over from the quarry. He refused, saying that it "wasn't in the orders."
So we're just leaving with nothing but armor and weapons. I don't know where we'll go, but we can't stay here. Maybe north to Chicago.
This is Lt. Davis, signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT:
该死……实验出错了。服从命令，放弃碉堡。我向上校建议，我们用采石场留下的 C-4 储藏室摧毁这个地方。他拒绝了，说这“不在命令中”。
所以我们只是带着盔甲和武器离开。我不知道我们会去哪里，但我们不能留在这里。也许北到芝加哥。
我是戴维斯中尉，正在签字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ... Start:Triangulate.cab Calculate:Location_x: 38.904209 Calculate:Location_y: -90.179901 .... .... Receive:Msg09462649 Transcribe:New Entry Point! Transcribe:So I think I've done it. I was looking at a map of the Alton subway system, and guess what? There's a metro tunnel that passes directly above the back end of the caves we've dug. Looks like we have our entrance! ... ... ... ... ... END
ESP.TRADUIT: ... 开始于：Triangulate.cab 计算：Location_x：38.904209 计算：Location_y：-90.179901 …… …… 接收：Msg09462649 转录：新的切入点！ 转录：所以我想我已经做到了。我在看一张奥尔顿地铁系统的地图，你猜怎么着？有一条地铁隧道直接从我们挖出的洞穴的后端上方穿过。看来我们有入口了！ ... ... ... ... ... 结尾

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Upon retrieving the explosives, you are to immediately hand it off to those located in Substation 51b. The substation is a safer means of transport than walking the explosives back to the vault.
Don't screw this up.
Stephen
ESP.TRADUIT:
取回爆炸物后，您应立即将其交给位于 Substation 51b 的人员。变电站是一种比将炸药送回保险库更安全的交通工具。
不要搞砸了。
斯蒂芬

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As I sit writing this final farewell, I can hear gunshots from down the tunnel. It's the Plague, and they're invading. The Underground Railroad, and with it this town's last true haven, is no more. Automated security has jammed most of the doors, if not all - permanently.
But why am I not with my friends, fighting? Because I've done enough to bring about our destruction as it is. Trusting the newcomer, letting him into our city, and furthermore trusting him with fixing the pipes. It's became evident over the past week that he tainted them with who knows what, as we've had three sick already.
Because of my foolishness and my naive, trusting nature, Stephen has won. So for that, I will not stand and fight, I will take the death that I now deserve with whatever dignity I have left.
John Hartrick, Head of Security, Underground Railroad
ESP.TRADUIT:
当我坐着写这最后的告别时，我能听到从隧道里传来的枪声。这是瘟疫，他们正在入侵。地下铁路，以及这个小镇最后一个真正的避风港，已经不复存在。自动化安全已经永久地堵塞了大部分门，如果不是全部的话。
但是为什么我不和我的朋友一起战斗呢？因为我已经做了足够多的事情来破坏我们的现状。信任新人，让他进入我们的城市，更信任他修理管道。过去一周很明显，他用谁知道是什么污染了他们，因为我们已经有三个病了。
由于我的愚蠢和天真、信任的天性，斯蒂芬赢了。所以为此，我不会站起来战斗，我会带着我所剩无几的尊严接受我现在应得的死亡。
约翰·哈特里克， 安全负责人，地下铁路

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Turret Terminal's password is BigThunder
ESP.TRADUIT: 炮塔终端的密码是 BigThunder

ESP.ORIGINAL:
July 29th, 2277:
Today we spotted a small Brotherhood battalion scouting the hills to the east of the Alton dump. While we currently do not have enough reinforcements to engage the battalion directly, we have sent word to the team scouting the ruins of St. Louis. We hope to have a unit sent to us within the coming weeks.
August 3rd, 2277:
Reinforcements were relocated from St. Louis to our location, along with a team of scientists that has been sent to the SatCom tower to the east. We have also received one "Deathclaw" unit (as it is called by the general populace). We hope to find and capture the Brotherhood battalion within the coming days.
August 16th, 2277:
The Brotherhood of Steel battalion that was spotted several weeks ago has not been sited since. Activity around the quarry itself has decreased significantly. As excess reinforcements are no longer necessary, I am diverting some back across the Mississippi and sending some to protect the integrity of the SatCom tower. As the Brotherhood battalion no longer appears to be active, this mission is considered a success.
1st Lieutenant Smith signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2277 年 7 月 29 日：
今天我们发现了一个小型兄弟会营在奥尔顿垃圾场东边的山丘上侦察。虽然我们目前没有足够的增援部队直接与该营交战，但我们已通知侦察圣路易斯废墟的小组。我们希望在未来几周内向我们发送一个单位。
2277 年 8 月 3 日：
增援部队从圣路易斯转移到了我们的位置，还有一组科学家被派往东部的卫星通信塔。我们还收到了一个“死亡爪”单位（普通民众称之为）。我们希望在未来几天内找到并俘虏兄弟会营。
2277 年 8 月 16 日：
几周前发现的钢铁兄弟会营此后一直没有找到。采石场周围的活动明显减少。由于不再需要过多的增援，我将一些人转移回密西西比河，并派遣一些人来保护卫星通信塔的完整性。由于兄弟会营似乎不再活跃，这项任务被认为是成功的。
第一史密斯中尉签字。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[ INITIALIZING SCANNERS ]
<SYSTEM> Date: 10/27/[YEAR UNKNOWN] --------------Errors reported: [ERROR: STACK OVERFLOW] --------------Status: Unstable
<SYSTEM> Date: 10/28/[YEAR UNKNOWN] --------------Errors reported: 9999999 --------------Status: Unstable

August 30th, 2077
This area has a good amount of resources for FEV production. The mutants are doing well and have taken over Godfrey. Spreading well and destroying the genetically ruined populace. Soon the whole area will be prime breeding ground, for our future army. The modified deathclaw does well here, exterminating any pests.
1st Lieutenant Smith signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2077 年 8 月 30 日
该地区拥有丰富的 FEV 生产资源。变种人表现不错，已经接管了戈弗雷。传播得很好，摧毁了基因受损的民众。 很快，整个地区将成为我们未来军队的主要滋生地。改良的死爪在这里表现很好，可以消灭任何害虫。
第一史密斯中尉签字。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Boy, do I have a story to tell.
I was scavenging the old Hopp farm a few years back, trying to find leather to make a sheath for my switchblade. In the old farmhouse, I heard a shriek and a loud BANG coming from upstairs. I dashed up the stairs into the room to find a massive mutant towering over this little girl, quivering and sobbing on the floor next to her friend who had just been crushed by the mutant's sledge. I tried to yell at her to get the hell out of there, to no avail. I knew that in order to save that girl, I had to react quickly. I took out my switchblade and immediately jumped on that mutant's back, jamming my knife repeatedly into the back of its head. The mutant let out this blood-curdling scream before finally dropping to the ground.
The mutant was finally dead. The girl that was trapped by the mutant had passed out from shock. I took the sledgehammer that the mutant was carrying for defense and brought her back to this trailer.
The next morning, she finally woke up. I stood up out of my chair and she immediately hid underneath the bed. It took hours to finally coax her out from underneath. We talked over a couple glasses of purified water that I had found in the house. She told me her name was Clarissa Baines and that the girl that was killed was her sister, Claudia.
I spent the next few months training her to survive in these wastes. Supplies gathering, sneaking, the works. The day finally came that I had to teach her how to use a real gun. As I finished setting up a shooting range with old beer bottles I had collected for this day, I heard a grunting sound coming from around the other side of the trailer. She must have felt like using a bigger weapon would keep her safer because she attempted to use my old minigun that hadn't been used in years. She could barely pick the damn thing up but persisted over using it despite me telling her that there was no way in hell she'd even be able to carry the damn thing around, no less fire it.
She took every single bottle out with a minigun. A MINIGUN. Who knew that she would end up being scary good with a minigun? I would have never guessed. I told her it was probably beginner's luck and that we would try again in a week.
I'll be damned if she didn't do it again.
She broke the chains of her own limitations.
We went on countless scouting runs to different locations in the area for supplies, mowing down any and all that opposed us.
We have to leave now. Clarissa is starting to lose her mind and needs to get away from this place. We're headed east to the Capital, to Megaton. Simms owes me one anyway. I have a place there we can stay for a while. Some old shack near his place.
Travis Sivart February 22, 2277
ESP.TRADUIT:
男孩，我有故事要讲吗？
几年前，我正在清理旧的霍普农场，试图找到皮革来为我的弹簧刀做鞘。古老的农舍里，我听到楼上传来一声尖叫和一声巨响。我冲上楼梯进入房间，发现一个巨大的变种人高高耸立在这个小女孩身上，在她刚刚被变种人雪橇压死的朋友旁边的地板上颤抖和抽泣。我试图对她大喊大叫，让她离开那里，但无济于事。我知道，为了救那个女孩，我必须迅速做出反应。我拿出弹簧刀，立刻跳到了那个变种人的背上，我的刀反复插进它的后脑勺。变异人发出一声令人毛骨悚然的惨叫，最终倒在了地上。
变种人终于死了。被变种人困住的少女惊魂未定。我拿着变种人用来防御的大锤，把她带回了这辆拖车。
第二天早上，她终于醒了。我从椅子上站起来，她立刻躲到床底下。花了几个小时才终于把她从下面哄出来。我们聊了几杯我在房子里找到的纯净水。她告诉我她的名字叫克拉丽莎·贝恩斯，被杀的女孩是她的妹妹克劳迪娅。
在接下来的几个月里，我训练她在这些废物中生存。物资收集，偷偷摸摸，作品。终于有一天，我必须教她如何使用真枪。当我用今天收集的旧啤酒瓶完成射击场的设置时，我听到从拖车另一侧传来的咕噜声。她一定觉得使用更大的武器会让她更安全，因为她试图使用我多年未使用的旧转轮机枪。尽管我告诉她，在地狱里，她甚至无法带着这该死的东西到处乱跑，更不用说开火了，但她几乎无法捡起这该死的东西，但仍坚持使用它。
她用迷你枪把每一瓶酒都拿出来了。迷你枪。谁知道她最终会用迷你枪变得可怕？我永远不会猜到。我告诉她这可能是初学者的运气，我们会在一周内再试一次。
如果她再不这样做，我会被诅咒的。
她打破了自己局限的枷锁。
我们进行了无数次侦察，前往该地区的不同地点寻找补给品，清除所有反对我们的东西。
我们现在必须离开。克拉丽莎开始失去理智，需要离开这个地方。我们向东前往首都，前往 Megaton。无论如何，西姆斯欠我一个。我在那儿有个地方可以住一会儿。他家附近的一些旧棚屋。
特拉维斯·西瓦特 2277 年 2 月 22 日

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Here is today's attendance report, and I've got to say, this is getting serious. If this goes on, we'll have to shut down, we can't afford to keep operating with this many students gone. We've heard attendance has dropped significantly in other schools in the area as well, so at least it's not only us. As usual, I have redacted the list of the absent students, as I'm sure you don't want to go through a 10 page list of kids any more than I do.
And you know, all of this hushed talk of war is going to be the death of us. I know I wouldn't be sending my kids to school at a time like this. Folks want to have their entire family together just in case Vault-Tec rings that dreaded alarm, and I can't blame them.
-ATTENDANCE, 10/22/2077-
Percentage present: 27%
Students present: 571
Students absent: 1544
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是今天的出勤报告，我不得不说，这越来越严重了。如果这种情况继续下去，我们将不得不关闭，我们不能在这么多学生离开的情况下继续运营。我们听说该地区其他学校的出勤率也大幅下降，所以至少不仅仅是我们。像往常一样，我已经编辑了缺席学生的名单，因为我相信你不会像我一样想要浏览 10 页的孩子名单。
而且你知道，所有这些关于战争的悄悄话都将是我们的死亡。我知道我不会在这种时候送我的孩子上学。人们希望全家聚在一起，以防万一 Vault-Tec 敲响了可怕的警报，我不能责怪他们。
-出席，2077 年 10 月 22 日-
在场百分比：27%
出席学生：571
缺席学生：1544

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I had hoped it wouldn't come to this. As of Monday, October 25th we are closing our doors for good. We simply don't have the funding to continue with such low attendance. It's been a pleasure working with you, Celia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，我希望它不会变成这样。从 10 月 25 日星期一开始，我们将永远关门。我们根本没有资金继续如此低的出席率。很高兴和你一起工作，西莉亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell have I gotten myself into? Wandering the Wastes, I find this shithole- Alton. Raiders downtown, and Mirelurks in the river. Looked for a place to hide the other day, and found out even the God damn hospital is infested with ghouls. Just about got killed by one of them glowin' ones. I'm running out of ammo, and I don't have anywhere to hide. I only have one chance- I've heard rumors that just north of downtown Alton is a village- and a friendly one too. Now all I have to do is push through these damned raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到底把自己卷入了什么？在荒原上徘徊，我找到了这个狗屎洞——奥尔顿。市中心的攻略，河里的米雷鲁克斯。前几天想找个地方躲起来，结果发现连该死的医院都到处都是食尸鬼。差点被其中一个发光的人杀死。 我的弹药快用完了，我也无处可藏。我只有一次机会——我听说奥尔顿市中心以北有一个村庄——而且也是一个友好的村庄。现在我所要做的就是推开这些该死的袭击者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There we go, she's ready. There should be a roadmap under the driver's seat. It should help quite a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走了，她准备好了。驾驶座下应该有一张路线图。它应该有很大帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for all you've done, newcomer. You've certainly changed Alton, whether it be for the better or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你所做的一切，新人。你肯定改变了奥尔顿，无论是好是坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, you will certainly be remembered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你一定会被记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, newcomer. What news do you bring?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，新人。你带来什么消息？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here she is. I found her in pristine condition down here a few years ago. The place was pretty well sealed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她在这。几年前我在这里发现她完好无损。这个地方密封得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea who built the place, but that doesn't matter right now. What does is getting this thing up and running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道是谁建造了这个地方，但这并不重要。什么是让这件事启动并运行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we need is a new Fuel Cell Controller. As far as I can tell, that's the only thing holding her back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要的是一个新的燃料电池控制器。据我所知，这是唯一阻碍她的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Found the fuel cell controller yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到燃料电池控制器了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, you've found one! Give me a couple of hours and she should be up and running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，你找到了！给我几个小时，她应该会启动并运行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There we go, she's ready. There should be a roadmap under the driver's seat. It should help quite a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走了，她准备好了。驾驶座下应该有一张路线图。它应该有很大帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for all you've done, newcomer. You've certainly changed Alton, whether it be for the better or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你所做的一切，新人。你肯定改变了奥尔顿，无论是好是坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, you will certainly be remembered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你一定会被记住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... this is it. It's time for you to finally head home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以……就是这样。是时候让你终于回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, newcomer. Come back and visit us sometime. Vault 59 will welcome you with open arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，新人。有时间回来拜访我们。 59 号避难所将张开双臂欢迎您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, newcomer. Come back and visit us again. Our doors are always open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，新人。回来再次拜访我们。我们的大门永远敞开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get going! I'm sure you have plenty of people waiting for you to get back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在开始吧！我相信你有很多人在等你回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much further, we are almost there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is done. The Plague... Stephen... they're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它完成了。流行病……斯蒂芬……他们走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Newcomer, I couldn't have done this without you. You came to us without the slightest idea of who we were, and you aided us in our time of need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新人，没有你我做不到。你来找我们，对我们是谁毫不知情，你在我们需要的时候帮助了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've finally put a stop to the monster that has destroyed the lives of countless people over the past two years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们终于制止了过去两年来摧毁无数人生命的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you've returned! So, do you have the explosives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你回来了！那么，你有炸药吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A99]AltonMQURSetup) Fight Fire With Fire EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A99]AltonMQURSetup) Fight Fire With Fire EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's finally over. Alton is ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于结束了。奥尔顿是我们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Newcomer, you were key in the fall of the Underground Railroad. Unlike the savages we slew today, you heard our story and came to our assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新人，你是地下铁路垮台的关键。与我们今天杀死的野蛮人不同，您听到了我们的故事并前来帮助我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And because of you, I finally can have some closure over the death of my parents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你，我终于可以对我父母的死有所了解了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back! How did things go in Godfrey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来！戈弗雷的情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down, pal. Who are you? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢点，伙计。你是谁？你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, you're back. I'm assuming all went well?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，你回来了。我假设一切顺利？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, gonna need to see some identification.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，需要看一些身份证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead and go on in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... who? You mean... are you for real? I'm safe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么谁？你的意思是……你是真的吗？我安全了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I need to get out of here! Here, take these supplies. It's all I have, but they'll only slow me down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我要离开这里！来，拿走这些补给品。这就是我所拥有的，但他们只会让我慢下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! Whoever you are, thank you! The... things they talked about doing to me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！不管你是谁，谢谢！他们说的对我做的事情...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't have anything to offer you except these supplies. I don't know why they didn't take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，除了这些补给品，我没有什么可以给你的。我不知道他们为什么不接受它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I'm alive! I can't believe it! I'm alive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我还活着！我简直不敢相信！我还活着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I managed to hide this stuff before they tied me up. You take it, it's the best I can do to thank you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，我设法在他们把我绑起来之前把这些东西藏了起来。你收下吧，这是我能做的最好的感谢你了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I managed to hide these supplies before they tied me up. You take them, it's the best I can do to thank you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，我设法在他们把我绑起来之前把这些物资藏起来。你带走他们，这是我能做的最好的感谢你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my God! I thought I was dead! You saved me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊！我以为我死了！你救了我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: They dropped this stuff... Why don't you take it? It's all I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们掉了这些东西……你为什么不拿走呢？这就是我所拥有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Godfrey Settler [0D3CFF7A] (mod) Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've returned. That means we can finally remove the final barrier standing between us and the Underground Railroad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。这意味着我们终于可以移除我们和地下铁路之间的最后一道屏障了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A98]AltonMQPlagueSetup) Uncharted Territory EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will, however, take some time to ready the explosives. Give us two days. Use your time however you please- explore Alton, drink, or whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，准备好炸药需要一些时间。给我们两天时间。随心所欲地利用你的时间——探索奥尔顿、喝酒或其他什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A98]AltonMQPlagueSetup) Uncharted Territory EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's a reward for retrieving the explosives. It was a shotgun that I won a few months ago, taken from the body of a Raider gang boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是取回炸药的奖励。那是我几个月前赢得的一把霰弹枪，取自一个突袭者帮派头目的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A98]AltonMQPlagueSetup) Uncharted Territory EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The time has come. Are you ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 时机已到。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A98]AltonMQPlagueSetup) Uncharted Territory EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like the adventurous type. Think you could help me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像喜欢冒险的人。你觉得你能帮帮我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Obongwa [0D008196] (mod) Quest : ([0D00821F]AltonAddonObongwaQuest) The Unusual Request EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back! How did things go in Godfrey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来！戈弗雷的情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, thanks a lot, it looks like the water pressure is back up. Take a few caps for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，非常感谢，看起来水压又恢复了。拿几个瓶盖回报你的付出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, you just got here, but you've already been pretty useful. I think you might be invaluable in our fight against the Plague.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，你刚到这里，但你已经很有用了。我认为你在我们与瘟疫的斗争中可能是无价的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. What have you learned?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。你学到了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you're new to this place. Who are you... and why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……你是这个地方的新手。你是谁？你为什么在这？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that plan didn't work out so well, now, did it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那个计划并没有那么顺利，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, hello, newcomer. Let's try this again, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你好，新人。让我们再试一次，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So here we are. We finally have a chance to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们在这里。我们终于有机会谈谈了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please hold your questions until I am done. I have good reasons for everything I have done so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请保留您的问题，直到我完成。到目前为止，我所做的一切都有充分的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the new recruit? Aren't you a bit... scrawny for this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是新来的？你是不是有点……骨瘦如柴？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to get going?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen you around, scrawny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没见过你，骨瘦如柴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you that you wouldn't regret it. You gave me, a complete stranger, a thousand caps to buy a room. You don't see kindness like that anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，你不会后悔的。你给了我，一个完全陌生的人，一千个瓶盖买了一个房间。你再也见不到这样的善意了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's 2000 caps. I have a roof over my head, an actual bed to sleep on, and I'm making money. You've changed my life, and I thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是2000个瓶盖。我有一个屋顶，一张真正可以睡觉的床，而且我正在赚钱。你改变了我的生活，我感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you that you wouldn't regret it. You changed my life by getting me in here, and I've finally saved up enough to buy you a room and repay you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，你不会后悔的。你让我进来改变了我的生活，我终于攒够了钱给你买了一个房间还给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a thousand caps. After what you did for me, you deserve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一千个瓶盖。在你为我所做的一切之后，你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The entrance to the utility tunnel is just south of here, by St. Clair's Hospital. Get in, replace the conductors, and report back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公用隧道的入口就在这里的南边，靠近圣克莱尔医院。上车，更换指挥，然后向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So have you talked to Hartrick yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你和哈特里克谈过了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen you around. Who let you in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没见过你。谁让你进来的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's far enough! Who are you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Bulls Eye [0D1A8855] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what, I was wrong about you. You really did us a favor, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我看错你了。你真的帮了我们一个忙，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our lives are about to get a whole lot easier, thanks to you. What can we do to repay you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您，我们的生活将变得更加轻松。我们能做些什么来回报你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Hartrick glares at you menacingly. You feel compelled to identify yourself.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [哈特里克威胁地瞪着你。你觉得有必要表明自己的身份。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold up, traveler. What's your business here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，旅行者。你来这里做什么生意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Jack Yearlen [0D24F842] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Will Arnold [0D24F85D] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I've ever seen you here before. The name's Jack Yearlen. Been livin' in Godfrey all of my life. You want a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我以前从没见过你。这个名字是杰克·伊尔伦。我一生都住在戈弗雷。想喝一杯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Yearlen [0D24F842] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you wasting my time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要浪费我的时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The guard has nothing to say to you.]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ted Maher [0D3FDD91] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need any medical supplies before we blow the tunnel, let me know now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果在我们炸毁隧道之前你需要任何医疗用品，现在就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ted Maher [0D3FDD91] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Sally Parker [0D3FEC63] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Lab Assistant [0D3E3A71] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't talk. Too busy taking notes.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lab Assistant [0D3FCEC2] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it, dude. Let's go bowling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的，伙计。我们去打保龄球吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Goodman [0D3FCEBD] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Dr. Tom Johnson [0D3FCEB7] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to do some killin'? If you want any of this shit, just holler and I'll get you set up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要做一些杀戮吗？如果你想要这些狗屎，只要喊一声，我就会给你安排好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reed Smith [0D3E937E] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need anything before we light this candle? Still going to have to charge you, though, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们点燃这支蜡烛之前你需要什么吗？不过，还是要向你收费，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reed Smith [0D3E937E] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the terminal if you want to buy anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果您想购买任何东西，请使用终端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bulls Eye [0D1A8855] (mod) Quest : ([0D0030DA]AltonzzTopicGraveyard) Dump unused dialogue here. EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought I made myself clear- it's 400 caps or no deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为我说清楚了-这是400个瓶盖或没戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have that kind of money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没有那么多钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I can't go that low.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <ROBCO DATA TRANSFER: Downloading information. One second.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <ROBCO 数据传输：正在下载信息。一秒钟。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dulles Outcast Signal Bravo [0D259E6F] (mod) Quest : ([0D259E6E]AltonFindQuestRadioStart) Quest that controls the radio to start Alton EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Er... you want me to get those things?
[You determine that he does indeed want you to retrieve those things.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你确定他确实想让你找回那些东西。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obongwa [0D008196] (mod) Quest : ([0D00821F]AltonAddonObongwaQuest) The Unusual Request EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I think you wanted these?
[He is overjoyed that you managed to retrieve those things.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他很高兴你设法取回了那些东西。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obongwa [0D008196] (mod) Quest : ([0D00821F]AltonAddonObongwaQuest) The Unusual Request EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Obongwa stares at you deeply, and you take it that he does not understand what you just said.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [Obongwa深深地盯着你，你以为他不明白你刚才说的话。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obongwa [0D008196] (mod) Quest : ([0D00821F]AltonAddonObongwaQuest) The Unusual Request EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how am I supposed to believe that? For all I know, you could be a member of the Plague trying to get inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么能相信呢？据我所知，你可能是瘟疫的成员，试图进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what. We had a problem with some of the conductors we rigged up a few years back to keep the Underground Railroad powered and heated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你什么。几年前我们为保持地下铁路供电和加热而安装的一些导体存在问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over the past few weeks, they've started to fail. As you can see from the lack of light, we're in an outage right now, and we need someone to fix them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在过去的几周里，他们开始失败。正如您从光线不足中看到的那样，我们现在处于停电状态，我们需要有人来修复它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That person is you. Tom Howard, the local repairman, just rigged us up a new batch of conductors. You'll need to replace the faulty ones with these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人就是你。当地的修理工汤姆霍华德刚刚给我们安排了一批新的售票员。您需要用这些替换有故障的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The entrance to the utility tunnel is just south of here, by St. Clair's Hospital. Get in, replace the conductors, and report back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公用隧道的入口就在这里的南边，靠近圣克莱尔医院。上车，更换指挥，然后向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A plane carrying me and five others crashed on the way to the west coast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一架载有我和其他五人的飞机在前往西海岸的途中坠毁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... do you join us, or do I crush you under my heel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以……你加入我们，还是我把你压在脚跟下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0D0439B8]RadioAlton) ITS DA RADIO! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not telling you a thing. Just let me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在告诉你狗屎——让我进去！

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you expect me to believe that?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then... you're not the brightest bulb in the bunch. When you're ready to explain yourself, come back and see me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你不是最聪明的一群。当你准备好解释自己时，回来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! The utility tunnel is right next to St. Clair's Hospital. It spits out on the other side of the station, we'll wait for you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伟大的！公用隧道就在圣克莱尔医院旁边。它吐在车站的另一边，我们会在那里等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had some charges set up at the gate in case we needed to get through. We'll detonate them when the power comes back on. Be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在门口设置了一些收费，以防我们需要通过。我们会在电源恢复时引爆它们。当心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. But remember, we need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白。但请记住，我们需要您的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I haven't had time to head down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没有时间去那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. We're all counting on you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) NPC : John Hartrick [0D25E4DA] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it when I feel like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在我喜欢的时候做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll be damned. You're one hell of a hero, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会被诅咒的，你真是个英雄，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let me introduce myself. The name's Hartrick... and this is the Underground Railroad, one of the few towns left in Alton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我自我介绍一下——我叫哈特里克。这是地下铁路——奥尔顿为数不多的几个城镇之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need anything, it was the least I could do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要任何东西，这是我能做的最少的事情。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let me introduce myself. The name's Hartrick... and this is the Underground Railroad, one of the few towns left in Alton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我自我介绍一下——我叫哈特里克。这是地下铁路——奥尔顿为数不多的几个城镇之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any equipment you could spare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么可以备用的设备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have much to go around, but... here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有太多可去的地方，但你去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let me introduce myself. The name's Hartrick... and this is the Underground Railroad, one of the few towns left in Alton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我自我介绍一下——我叫哈特里克。这是地下铁路——奥尔顿为数不多的几个城镇之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure is. Smack dab in the middle of the United States. Alton used to be a nice place to live... at least, comparing to the surrounding areas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是。在美国中部轻拍。奥尔顿曾经是一个非常适合居住的地方……嗯，与周边地区相比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then the Plague showed up, and things went to hell. They claim they're out for revenge, and have gone around burning every town they come upon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但后来瘟疫出现了，事情就这么糟糕了。他们声称他们是来报仇的，并且到处烧毁他们遇到的每个城镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only town that's managed to stay out of it is New Godfrey. No idea why that is. But New Godfrey has problems of its own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一设法避开它的城镇是新戈弗雷。不知道为什么会这样。但戈弗雷也有自己的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, where are you from, newcomer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，你来自哪里，新人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, that's a long ways away... are you looking for a way home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，那是一个很长的路要走。你在寻找回家的路吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm from the Capital, I crashed on the way to help the Brotherhood of Steel. It's a long story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自华盛顿特区，在帮助钢铁兄弟会的路上撞车了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, helping you is the least I can do to repay you. But I don't have any ideas... except for walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，帮助你是我能做的最起码的报答你。但我没有任何想法，除了走路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who may know... is the self-proclaimed "mayor" of Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁可能知道是戈弗雷自称的“市长”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, helping you is the least I can do to repay you. But I don't have any ideas... except for one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，帮助你是我能做的最起码的报答你。但我没有任何想法，除了一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who may know... is the self-proclaimed "mayor" of Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁可能知道是戈弗雷自称的“市长”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the hell would I want to stay here?
A ways north from here. I'll mark it on your map. Don't bother telling him that I sent you... he doesn't give a shit about our town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这里往北走。我会在你的地图上标出来。别费心告诉他是我派你来的——他根本不在乎我们的小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid so. It's a ways north from here. I'll mark it on your map. Don't bother telling him that I sent you... he doesn't give a shit about our town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕是这样。这是这里以北的一段路。我会在你的地图上标出来。别费心告诉他是我派你来的——他根本不在乎我们的小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean I have to do more walking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是我必须做更多的步行？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you. Good luck, newcomer.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that I trust Hartrick's decisions, but you don't look too threatening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是说我相信哈特里克的决定，但你看起来并没有太大的威胁性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fixed the power, so in exchange Hartrick let me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我修好了电源，所以作为交换，哈特里克让我进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, bud, I don't answer to anyone. Now how about you ask a bit nicer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，伙计，我不回答任何人。现在你问得好一点怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the hell do you care? Just pour me a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈为什么在乎？给我倒一杯吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good decision. Now do you want a drink or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好决定。现在你想不想喝一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take that as a compliment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把它当作一种恭维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the finest drinks in Alton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有奥尔顿最好的饮料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just show me what you have.
Good, I was getting sick of you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty to do. What do you want to know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多事情要做。你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I get a drink around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这附近哪里可以喝一杯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you want a beer or two, head down to the bar at the station entrance... but watch out for Jared, though. I wouldn't trust him as far as I could throw him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果您想要一两杯啤酒，请前往车站入口处的酒吧。不过要小心贾里德——只要我能把他扔出去，我都不会相信他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want some real food, head down to Martha's Kitchen. You can find it in the Lower Commons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想要一些真正的食物，那就去玛莎厨房吧。你可以在下议院找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For guns, ammo, and armor, check out The Big Bang, in the Commons. For chems and everything else, check out Frank's Goods near the entrance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于枪支、弹药和盔甲，请查看 Commons 中的 The Big Bang。对于化学品和其他一切，请查看入口附近的 Frank's Goods。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, judging by your parachute over there, it probably ripped on the way down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，从你那边的降落伞来看，它可能在下降的路上撕裂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, you should've seen the explosions that plane of yours made! I can't believe you survived that fall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，你应该看到你的飞机造成的爆炸！我不敢相信你在那个秋天幸存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，欢迎来到奥尔顿，新人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't your average wasteland. While we have your typical raiders, Super Mutants, and other creatures, there's also the Plague.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是一般的荒地。虽然我们有你的标准掠夺者、超级变种人和其他生物，但还有瘟疫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, neither can I. Where exactly am I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我也不能。我到底在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Plague is a group of cast-out bastards that have been going around burning everything in the sake of 'revenge'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瘟疫是一种被抛弃的混蛋的崇拜，他们为了“复仇”而烧毁了奥尔顿的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their first reported attacks started two years ago... that's when things went to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们第一次报告的攻击大约是在两年前开始的，那是事情变得糟糕的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Plague is a group of cast-out bastards that have been going around burning everything in the sake of 'revenge'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瘟疫是一种被抛弃的混蛋的崇拜，他们为了“复仇”而烧毁了奥尔顿的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their first reported attacks started two years ago... that's when things went to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们第一次报告的攻击大约是在两年前开始的，那是事情变得糟糕的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They invaded our homes, stole our food, and burnt our houses to the ground! That's what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们入侵了我们的家园，偷走了我们的食物，将我们的城镇烧毁，这就是发生的事情！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're probably the most dangerous thing out here, and they're also the ones that stole your gear. Why they left you alive is beyond me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能是这里最危险的东西，也是偷走你装备的人。他们为什么让你活着，我无法理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like how you think. They're likely holed up in Belleview. Here's some armor and a gun to help get you through. Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你的想法。他们很可能躲在Belleview。这里有一些盔甲和一把枪可以让你通过。我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then, let's get my gear back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，让我们把我的装备拿回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the finest in Alton.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have to drink?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Jared Bensman [0D0326EB] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this thing on? My name is Dr. Stephen M. Russell, and I am a surgeon working at Children's Hospital in St. Louis, Missouri.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有这玩意吗？我的名字是 Stephen M. Russell 博士，我是一名外科医生，在密苏里州圣路易斯的儿童医院工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Stephen M. Russell [0D1030DD] (mod) Quest : ([0D1030DB]AltonHolotapes) Alton Worldspace Audio Marker move quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Alton, currently ranking number one in 'worst place to live.'
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到奥尔顿，目前在“最差居住地”中排名第一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got your typical raiders, Super Mutants, and other creatures, but there's also the Plague.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有典型的掠夺者、超级变种人和其他生物，但也有瘟疫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford it. They want 1000 caps, and I just... don't have that kind of money. I wouldn't even care if I had a room to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我买不起。哈特里克想要 1000 个瓶盖，而我没有那么多钱。我什至不在乎我是否有自己的房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I could just get in, I would make so much more than sitting out here. You're the first person I've had pass by in a few days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能进去，我会比坐在外面赚得多。你是我这几天第一个经过的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've tried talking to Hartrick about it, but he's convinced... well, he thinks that I simply don't belong in his city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着和哈特里克谈过这件事，但他确信……好吧，他认为我根本不属于他的城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why aren't you set up inside the station?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不在车站内设置？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't need anything? Well, I really appreciate that. Trust me, it'll be... worth your while. Talk to Hartrick, he's the one I dealt with before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都不需要？嗯，我真的很感激。相信我，这将是值得的。和哈特里克谈谈，他是我之前处理过的那个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to Hartrick for you, I don't need a reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会为你和哈特里克谈谈，我不需要奖励。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll pay you the moment I walk into the Railroad. Thank you, and... good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我会在我走进铁路的那一刻付钱给你。谢谢你，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to Hartrick about you getting in, but it won't be free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会和哈特里克谈谈你进来的事，但它不会是免费的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. It's almost all I have, but I'll make it back eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这几乎是我所拥有的，但我最终会回来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to Hartrick, but I'll need 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会和 Hartrick 谈谈，但我需要 500 个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, I understand. Need something else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，我明白了。需要别的东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't gotten around to it, yet.
I have a fine collection of items!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it. I'm sick of Hartrick sending his problems to me. The name is Robert Johnson. Well, what do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的。我厌倦了哈特里克把他的问题发给我。这个名字是罗伯特·约翰逊。嗯，你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was told I could find some help here by someone named Hartrick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我，我可以在这里找到一个名叫 Hartrick 的人的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I might have a ride for you. But it's not something I'd easily let go. You'll need to do something for me first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我可能会为你搭车。但这不是我会轻易放手的东西。你得先为我做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This town is called "New" Godfrey for a reason. We used to live in what is now "Old" Godfrey, but Super Mutants took over the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个小镇被称为“新”戈弗雷是有原因的。我们曾经住在现在的“老”戈弗雷，但超级变种人接管了这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们希望老戈弗雷回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: My plane crashed and I heard you might be able to find me a ride home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的飞机坠毁了，我听说你也许能找到我回家的车。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want a ride? Then you'd better listen real close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想搭车吗？那你最好仔细听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in New Godfrey. We used to live in what is now Old Godfrey, but it got taken over by Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在新戈弗雷。我们曾经住在现在的老戈弗雷，但它被超级变种人接管了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go in, kill every last one of them, and you might get your ride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进去，杀死他们中的每一个，你可能会得到你的搭便车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I'm a "problem?" Listen, all I want is a ride home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我是个“问题”？听着，我只想搭车回家。
