ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's always good to see a new face around town. The name is Robert Johnson. As long as you stay out of trouble, you're welcome to stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，在镇上看到一张新面孔总是好的。这个名字是罗伯特·约翰逊。只要你不惹麻烦，就欢迎你留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say I'm new to the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假设我是该地区的新手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly. Get rid of the Super Mutants, and report back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切地。摆脱超级变种人，然后向我报告。我们还听说他们没有深入山中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've also heard reports of the Mutants moving further north, up in some hills east of the Dust Bowl. Clear out Godfrey first, then search the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还听说了变种人向北移动的报道，在沙尘碗以东的一些山丘上移动。先清除戈弗雷，然后搜索营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess. I go in, blow a few heads off, and I'll get a way back home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜。我进去，吹了几个头，我就能找到回家的路？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's what I like to hear! Once they're all dead, report back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这就是我喜欢听的！等他们都死了，再向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've also heard reports of the Mutants moving further north, up in some hills east of the Dust Bowl. Clear out Godfrey first, then search the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还听说了变种人向北移动的报道，在沙尘碗以东的一些山丘上移动。先清除戈弗雷，然后搜索营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then, why am I waiting here when I could be shooting some mutants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，既然我可以拍摄一些变种人，我为什么还要在这里等呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you manage to survive, come find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能活下来，就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've also heard reports of the Mutants moving further north, up in some hills east of the Dust Bowl. Clear out Godfrey first, then search the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还听说了变种人向北移动的报道，在沙尘碗以东的一些山丘上移动。先清除戈弗雷，然后搜索营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll clear out your town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会清理你的城镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anywhere I can rent a room?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么地方可以租房间吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell you what... I'll sell you a permanent room for 700 caps. Sound fair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你什么... 我会卖给你一个 700 瓶盖的永久房间。听起来公平吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, here's the key. It's right off the main entrance across from Jared Bensman's room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，这是关键。它就在杰瑞德·本斯曼房间对面的正门旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? After all you've done for us, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，你为我们所做的一切，当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Here's the key. It's right off the main entrance across from Jared Bensman's room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伟大的。这是关键。它就在杰瑞德·本斯曼房间对面的正门旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have that kind of money right now.
Of course... I'd love the chance to get rid of more of them. They're likely holed up in Belleview. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然……我很想有机会摆脱更多。他们很可能躲在贝尔维尤。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D0DB4A6]AltonMichaelQuest) Michael Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you help me get my gear back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我拿回我的装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anywhere Frank Randolph could stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克·兰道夫有什么可以住的地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a spare room down past the commons area. If he wants a bed to stay in, I want half of his profits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公共区后面有一个空余房间。如果他想要一张床，我要他一半的利润。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: For nothing? You and your people abandoned us when we most needed help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不求回报？当我们最需要帮助时，您和您的人民抛弃了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were only driven to insanity after our 200 year confinement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们被监禁 200 年后，我们才被逼疯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that so? Unfortunately, you won't get to see how that turns out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样吗？不幸的是，你不会看到结果如何。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye... John Hartrick, and to Hell with you and your "Family"
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见......约翰哈特里克，和你和你的“家人”一起下地狱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bastard. You have ruined what little Alton had left. And for what? Nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个混蛋。你毁了小奥尔顿留下的东西。为了什么？没有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were all insane! Why would we let people like you out of a vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都疯了！我们为什么要让像你这样的人离开避难所？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You never belonged in our town, Stephen! You and your kind will never replace what you have destroyed today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从来不属于我们的小镇，斯蒂芬！你和你的同类永远不会取代你今天摧毁的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing left because of you... nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你，我一无所有……一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way to go. Now why are you wasting my time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好样的。现在你为什么要浪费我的时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have to be a giant bitch?
Kid, you go through what I have and you aren't exactly going to be bright and cheery all the damn time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，你经历了我所拥有的一切，你不会一直都那么开朗活泼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, like I said, he's somewhere in the South Godfrey Metro Station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，就像我说的，他在南戈弗雷地铁站的某个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, again, if you manage to find the package he took, do not open it. And don't worry, you'll get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一次，如果你设法找到他拿的包裹，不要打开它。别担心，你会得到报酬的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's cut to the chase. I'll find him. Do you know where he might be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们切入正题。我会找到他的。你知道他可能在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Straight to the point. I like it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, like I said, he's somewhere in the South Godfrey Metro Station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，就像我说的，他在南戈弗雷地铁站的某个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, again, if you manage to find the package he took, do not open it. I mean that. And don't worry, you'll get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一次，如果你设法找到他拿的包裹，不要打开它。我的意思是。别担心，你会得到报酬的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do around here?
I found your husband and the package. He was killed by the ghouls in the tunnels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你丈夫和包裹。他被隧道里的食尸鬼杀死了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And great, you've got the package. Well, here's 200 caps, and my husband's old pistol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，你已经拿到了包裹。嗯，这里有 200 caps，还有我丈夫的旧手枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's supposed to be something special, but I don't see anything too great about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它应该是一些特别的东西，但我看不出它有什么特别之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D3F7591]AltonMS05) The Lost Lovers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you actually do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你在这里做什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the one that makes sure everything runs smoothly around here. Anyone causes any problems, I have to deal with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是确保这里一切顺利的人。任何人造成任何问题，我必须处理它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let the bodies rot. The Radroaches can take care of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让尸体腐烂。 辐射蟑螂可以照顾他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bastards left you to die, so we repaid the favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋让你等死，所以我们报了恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed. What happened today shall go down in history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确。今天发生的事，必将载入史册。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now our attention turns to you. From what I hear, Robert Johnson of Godfrey has a ride for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在我们的注意力转向了你。据我所知，Godfrey 的 Robert Johnson 为您安排了行程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Godfrey was the only town to help us then, so hopefully they will also help you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈弗雷是当时唯一帮助我们的城镇，所以希望他们现在也能帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D3DDF37]AltonMQPlagueFinale) Like Rats In The Walls EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你需要一些帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father went missing years ago. He's almost certainly dead by now. I just wish I could know for sure for some closure, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲几年前失踪了。他现在几乎可以肯定已经死了。我只是希望我能确定，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was an explorer at heart. He even took me on a few of them as a kid. But one day, he just never came back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他本质上是一个探险家。他甚至在我还是个孩子的时候就带了我几个。但是有一天，他就再也没有回来过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was going to explore the SE corner of Alton. There are a lot of Raiders in the area, and the ones by the cornfields are known to capture people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他打算探索奥尔顿的东南角。该地区有很多攻略，并且以玉米地为名的那些以抓人着称。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's most likely they probably captured and killed him. You'll know it's him if you find a gold necklace that he always had with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们很可能抓住并杀死了他。如果您找到他一直随身携带的金项链，您就会知道是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can bring the necklace to me, it'd mean a lot and would finally bring me some closure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能把项链带给我，那将意义重大，最终会给我带来一些结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Sad

ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你父亲的项链。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, at least now I'm sure of his fate. Thank you, stranger. While I'll never be able to truly move on, this has put me one step closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，至少现在我确定了他的命运。谢谢你，陌生人。虽然我永远无法真正继续前进，但这让我更近了一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D387C22]AltonMS04) Smaller Shovel, Smaller Hole EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have for sale?
Apparently, the Super Mutants that took over Old Godfrey have started moving north. Who knows how long it'll be before they get New Godfrey too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，接管老戈弗雷的超级变种人已经开始向北移动。谁知道他们还要多久才能得到新戈弗雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : David Hawthorne [0D20500D] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else that I could help with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么我可以帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, when you turned the power on, the boiler never started back up. Here's a key to get in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，当你打开电源时，锅炉永远不会重新启动。这是进入的钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D125B61]AltonMS02) Give It a Good Mopping EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tom Howard says you'll need some scrap metal, two bottles of Wonderglue, and a lead pipe. Report back to me after it's fixed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤姆霍华德说你需要一些废金属、两瓶 Wonderglue 和一根铅管。修好后反馈给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D125B61]AltonMS02) Give It a Good Mopping EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fixed the boiler...and killed a few Mirelurks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我修好了锅炉……并杀死了一些 泥鳅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mirelurks, really? I'll send a few guys down there, who knows what they'll find. Here's some caps for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泥鳅，真的吗？我会派几个人去那里，谁知道他们会找到什么。这里有一些 caps，可以解决您的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D125B61]AltonMS02) Give It a Good Mopping EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stephen, what brings you here? Oh, and the newcomer, too. This is a surprise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯蒂芬，是什么把你带到这里来的？哦，还有新人。这是一个惊喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hartrick, what are you doing in my... oh, the newcomer too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈特里克，你在我的……哦，新人也在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the Underground Railroad... gone... just like that. How did you manage to wipe out an entire city?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以地下铁路……消失了……就这样。你是如何设法消灭整个城市的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, so I've heard... let's get to work. We need to head to the old radio station just south of here, that's where the truck is. Let's head out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，所以我听说...让我们开始工作吧。我们需要前往南边的旧广播电台，那是卡车所在的地方。我们出去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you again Robert. Today has been historic. We invaded the Underground Railroad. They're gone, and I took care of Hartrick myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你，罗伯特。今天是历史性的。我们入侵了地下铁路。他们走了，我自己照顾了哈特里克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it wasn't for the newcomer, it never would've happened. I've also heard that he took Old Godfrey back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是新人，这件事永远不会发生。我还听说他把老戈弗雷带回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ted Maher [0D3FDD91] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ted Maher [0D3FDD91] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop by if you need anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果您需要其他任何东西，请停下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Tom Johnson [0D3FCEB7] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有什么可以帮忙的吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got news that there's a group of Plague remnants that have set up shop downtown, just north of the western forests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有消息说，在西部森林以北的市中心，有一群瘟疫残余分子在市中心开设了商店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They aren't a major threat, but we aren't going to take any chances. There are other groups, but this is one of the larger, more organized ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们不是主要威胁，但我们不会冒险。还有其他团体，但这是更大、更有组织的团体之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll mark the location on your map. Come back and see me once they're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在你的地图上标出位置。等他们死了再回来看我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, there is. We've spotted a group of resistance fighters that apparently survived our raid on the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在这里。我们发现了一群抵抗战士，他们显然在我们对地下铁路的突袭中幸存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were spotted on the fringes of Alton, around the Last Chance Gas. They aren't a major threat, but we don't want this turning into something big.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们被发现在奥尔顿的边缘，在最后机会气体附近。它们不是主要威胁，但我们不希望这变成大事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find them and wipe them out. Return to me once you're finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到它们并消灭它们。完成后回到我身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The clinic is towards the front and to the left. He should be able to patch you up if you need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诊所在前面和左边。如果您需要，他应该能够修补您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The battle for the ages happened, that's what. I've made my choice and I have no regrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世纪之战发生了，就是这样。我已经做出了选择，我不后悔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're just... gone? Well, it was either one or the other, I suppose, and it's certainly a relief to have it taken care of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只是……走了？好吧，我想，它要么是其中的一个，要么是另一个，得到它的照顾当然是一种解脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that the situation has finally bubbled over, we can finally get to the matter at hand, getting you home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在情况终于浮出水面，我们终于可以处理手头的事情了，让你回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a truck, and as far as I know, it's the only one of it's kind. It's in a garage just south of here. Let's head out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一辆卡车，据我所知，它是唯一一辆这样的卡车。它就在南边的一个车库里。我们出去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以找到一个？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try the neighborhood just south of the Hopp Hollow Farm. There's more than one house still standing down there, so that sounds like the best bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试霍普空心农场以南的社区。那里还有不止一所房子，所以这听起来是最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can find one, it's likely going to be in a garage. They were a pretty common, but expensive, car part back in the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到一个，它很可能会在车库里。在当时，它们是一种很常见但价格昂贵的汽车部件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck. We'll be waiting here for you when you return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运。当你回来时，我们会在这里等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D4303EA]AltonMQPlagueEndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the finest drinks in Alton!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有奥尔顿最好的饮料！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Yearlen [0D24F842] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a place northwest of here called the Divide... I'd stay clear of there if I were you. Nothing there but radiation and ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: There's a place northwest of here called the Divide... I'd stay clear of there if I were you. Nothing but radiation and ghouls.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Yearlen [0D24F842] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, we'll take whoever we can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们会带走我们能找到的任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm going to tell you straight-up, the no-bullshit version of what to expect. You're probably going to get the living hell shot out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我要直截了当地告诉你，没有胡说八道的版本。你可能会从你身上得到活生生的地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We received a long distance distress signal from the west coast a few days ago, meaning... the Brotherhood is in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天前，我们收到了来自西海岸的长途求救信号，这意味着兄弟会遇到了麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We both know Lyons is gonna stay holed up and rot. We're the only ones that have both the courage and the technology to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都知道里昂会一直呆在家里腐烂。我们是唯一有勇气和技术去提供帮助的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be, but I can still do the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能是，但我仍然可以完成这项工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get smart with me. I'd served my entire life in the Brotherhood before Lyons came along. I could kick your ass all the way to goddamn Kansas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要对我耍小聪明。在里昂出现之前，我已经为兄弟会服务了一生。我可以一直踢你的屁股到该死的堪萨斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm going to tell you straight-up, the no-bullshit version of what to expect. You're probably going to get the living hell shot out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我要直截了当地告诉你，没有胡说八道的版本。你可能会从你身上得到活生生的地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We received a long distance distress signal from the west coast a few days ago, meaning... the Brotherhood is in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天前，我们收到了来自西海岸的长途求救信号，这意味着兄弟会遇到了麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We both know that Lyons is gonna stay holed up and rot. We're the only ones that have both the courage and the technology to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都知道里昂会一直呆在家里腐烂。我们是唯一有勇气和技术去提供帮助的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, maybe. You think that makes me less qualified?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，也许。你认为那会降低我的资格吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Precisely. I'll pilot the plane, and your job is to just sit there and watch until we touch down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰恰。我会驾驶飞机。你的工作就是坐在那里看着我们着陆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do manage to get back alive, there'll be quite a reward to be had. But if you want to make it back, you're going to have to do what I say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的设法活着回来，将会有相当多的奖励。但如果你想挽回，你就必须按照我说的去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing that's where the plane comes in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这就是飞机进来的地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you one of those tech guys that tries to sound smart all the time? I don't have time for that, and frankly, I like you less than I did before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是那些一直试图听起来很聪明的技术人员之一吗？我没有时间，坦率地说，我比以前更不喜欢你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have enough of you techies already. All you have to worry about is buckling your seatbelt. It shouldn't be too hard for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够了你们这些技术人员。您所需要担心的只是系好安全带。对你来说应该不会太难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do manage to make it back alive, there'll be quite a reward to be had. But if you want to make it back, you'll have to do what I say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的设法让它活着回来，将会有相当多的奖励。但如果你想挽回，你就必须按照我说的去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But wouldn't the plane's control system have been fried in the war?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是飞机的控制系统不会在战争中被炸了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, let's get this show on the road! Boys, move out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们让这个节目上路吧！孩子们，搬出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I'm ready to go.
Well, you'd better hurry your ass up. I'm not waiting forever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你最好快点——我不会永远等的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Commander Atkins [0D22695E] (mod) Quest : ([0D05B5B9]AltonFindQuest) She Runs On Motivation EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready to go yet.
I've wiped out the Plague Remnants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经消灭了瘟疫残余。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so they're finally gone for good. Thank you, newcomer, here are some caps for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，所以他们终于永远离开了。谢谢你，新人，这里有一些 caps 来解决你的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've wiped out the resistance fighters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经消灭了抵抗战士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! We can finally rest easy knowing that the last of those rats are gone for good. Take some caps for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出色的！知道最后一只老鼠永远消失了，我们终于可以高枕无忧了。拿一些瓶盖来解决你的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D4214A0]AltonMS07) Eviction Notice EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Planning on going out and getting shot up, eh?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Arnold [0D26C79B] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stan Arnold [0D26C79B] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ERROR: Command not recognized. Please try again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 错误：命令无法识别。请再试一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bulls Eye [0D1A8855] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All in good time... but the question still stands. Who are you, newcomer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是好时光。问题仍然存在……你是谁，新人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were those people? Why have you killed them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些人是谁？你为什么杀了他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You survived a plane crash? Impressive. You say you come from the Capital; tell me, what treasures can be found at such a place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在飞机失事中幸存下来？感人的。你说你来自首都；告诉我，在这样的地方能找到什么宝物？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood of Steel... but they haven't been seen for ages! Oh, what must lie beyond this insignificant town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会？但他们已经很久没有见过了！哦，在这个微不足道的小镇之外一定有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, I'm getting ahead of myself. My name is Stephen Clark. I am the leader of what these people call 'The Plague'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我走得太远了。我的名字是斯蒂芬克拉克，这些人称之为“瘟疫”的领袖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are in Alton, Illinois. The ruins you stand in were once called Belleview. This is what happens to those who ignore our cries for help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在伊利诺伊州的奥尔顿。你站在的废墟曾经被称为Belleview。这就是那些忽视我们呼救的人所发生的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: My plane crashed on my way to the west coast to aid the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的飞机在前往西海岸援助兄弟会的途中坠毁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, please. You don't honestly expect this to end well for you... do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，请。老实说，你不会期望这会为你带来好的结局，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you. You too shall burn for what you've done here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的。你也会为你在这里所做的一切而燃烧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well. You could have gone on to do great things with me. Goodbye, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。你本可以继续和我一起做伟大的事情。再见，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, good. I'd hoped you were more civilized than that. Now... who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊好。我希望你比那更文明。所以，你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no need for a fight. Let's talk like civilized adults.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要打架。让我们像男人一样说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me, along with a few hundred others, were trapped in Vault 59 for many years. The things that place did to your mind... it was maddening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和其他几百人被困在 59 号避难所多年。那个地方对你造成的影响……令人抓狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our water chip had long since broken, and our food supply was dwindling. Our last hope was a distress beacon, which we prayed would reach the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的水芯片早就坏了，我们的食物供应也在减少。我们最后的希望是一个求救信标，我们祈祷它会到达废土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one came to our aid. Months later, a scout from the town of Godfrey picked up the signal and managed to open the doors from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人来帮助我们。几个月后，戈德雷镇的一名侦察员收到了信号，并设法从外面打开了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They had been the only ones to help us. He told us that traders passed through the area quite often, and would've easily been able to pick up the signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是唯一帮助我们的人。他告诉我们，交易员经常经过该地区，很容易就能听到信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea what we have been through. We have had to do things to survive that you couldn't even fathom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道我们经历了什么。为了生存，我们不得不做一些你甚至无法理解的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your idea of revenge? You're sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你复仇的想法？你生病了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have more need for your equipment than you do. We aren't exactly swimming around in weapons and Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们比你更需要你的财产。We aren't exactly swimming in weapons and Stimpaks.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done talking, where's my stuff?
Oh, well. You could have gone on to do great things with me. Goodbye, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。你本可以继续和我一起做伟大的事情。再见，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, I'll take my stuff back if I have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的，如果有必要，我会把我的东西拿回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me, along with a few hundred others, were trapped in Vault 59 for many years. The things that place did to your mind... it was maddening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和其他几百人被困在 59 号避难所多年。那个地方对你造成的影响……令人抓狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our water chip had long since broken, and our food supply was dwindling. Our last hope was a distress beacon, which we prayed would reach the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的水芯片早就坏了，我们的食物供应也在减少。我们最后的希望是一个求救信标，我们祈祷它会到达废土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one came to our aid. Months later, a scout from the town of Godfrey picked up the signal and managed to open the doors from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人来帮助我们。几个月后，戈德雷镇的一名侦察员收到了信号，并设法从外面打开了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: They had been the only ones to help us. He told us that traders passed through the area quite often, and would've easily been able to pick up the signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是唯一帮助我们的人。他告诉我们，交易员经常经过该地区，很容易就能听到信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Why have you done this to these people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。你为什么要这样对这些人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky for you I was here. Judging by your cell mate, these 'Plague' people aren't known to be forgiving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很幸运，从你的狱友看来，我在这里。众所周知，这些“瘟疫”人不宽容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're lucky I was even here! Otherwise, you probably would've turned out like these other piles of bones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你很幸运，我在这里！否则，你可能会变成像其他一堆骨头一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where were you, man? You should've been here hours ago!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在哪里，伙计？你应该几个小时前就到了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, you're welcome. Anyways, your gear's likely upstairs, seeing as how this is the only building that isn't on fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的-不客气。无论如何，它很可能在楼上，因为这是唯一没有着火的建筑物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think anybody other than that poor fellow I shot on the way in heard me, so you should be able to catch anyone upstairs off guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想除了我在路上射中的那个可怜的家伙之外没有人听到我的声音，所以你应该可以让楼上的任何人措手不及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stay down here in case you manage to land yourself into another jail cell. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这里，以防你把自己关进另一个牢房。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, don't mention it. Anyways, your gear's likely upstairs, seeing as how this is the only building that's not on fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别提了。无论如何，你的装备很可能在楼上，因为这是唯一没有着火的建筑物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think anybody other than that poor fellow I shot on the way in heard me, so you should be able to catch anyone upstairs off guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想除了我在路上射中的那个可怜的家伙之外没有人听到我的声音，所以你应该可以让楼上的任何人措手不及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stay down here in case you manage to land yourself into another jail cell. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这里，以防你把自己关进另一个牢房。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I was in a tight spot right there.
Not even a thank you? Anyways, your gear's likely upstairs, seeing as how this is the only building that isn't on fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连一句谢谢都没有？无论如何，你的装备很可能在楼上，因为这是唯一没有着火的建筑物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think anybody other than that poor fellow I shot on the way in heard me, so you should be able to catch anyone upstairs off guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想除了我在路上射中的那个可怜的家伙之外没有人听到我的声音，所以你应该可以让楼上的任何人措手不及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stay down here in case you manage to land yourself into another jail cell. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这里，以防你把自己关进另一个牢房。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea where my gear is at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道我的装备在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was only a matter of time. Well, that's my home. I've lived there all my life. We have to warn them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是时间问题。那是我的家。我一生都住在那里。我们必须警告他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's head there, then. I'm not so sure Hartrick will trust you, but we'll see when we get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就去那里吧。我不太确定 Hartrick 会信任你，但我们到时再看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this on the terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在终端上找到了这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure? Nothing about future plans? Well, we should prepare the Underground anyway. We're the only ones left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定吗？瘟疫的未来计划什么都没有？无论如何，我们应该准备好地下，我们是最后剩下的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's head there, then. I'm not so sure Hartrick will trust you, but we'll see when we get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就去那里吧。我不太确定 Hartrick 会信任你，但我们到时再看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Douglas [0D0D9892] (mod) Quest : ([0D334E3F]AltonMQ01) We Aren't In Kansas Anymore EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] I found my gear and uh... that's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [谎言] 我找到了我的装备，呃……就是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, where do you wanna go?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use some directions around town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以使用城镇周围的一些方向。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The common house, in the back of Old Godfrey, on the left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公共住宅在老戈弗雷的后面，在左边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are the vendors in town?
The general store is right up front, to the right, and under the deck. You can grab a drink at the bar behind it, you'll see some tables out front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杂货店就在前面、右边和甲板下面。你可以在它后面的酒吧喝一杯，你会看到前面有几张桌子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Finally, somebody civil. So, let's start at the beginning. This story starts twenty years ago, when I was just a kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。最后，有人文明。所以，让我们从头开始。这个故事开始于二十年前，那时我还是个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At that age, I heard a lot, seeing as my father was the Overseer of this Vault. It started with problems with the water chip and low food stores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那个年纪，我听到了很多，因为我父亲是这个避难所的监督者。它始于水芯片和低食品商店的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, over the years it quickly grew into a much larger problem. The water chip finally broke, and we were on our last rations of food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，多年来，它迅速发展成为一个更大的问题。水片终于断了，我们吃到了最后的食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, my father had been working on getting us out of here. He broadcast a distress signal every day, hoping it would reach the surface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，我父亲一直在努力让我们离开这里。他每天都发出求救信号，希望它能够到达水面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When that didn't work, we started tunneling past our Vault's walls. Luckily enough for us, there was quite a bit of equipment suited for digging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这不起作用时，我们开始在避难所的墙壁上挖隧道。对我们来说幸运的是，有相当多的设备适合挖掘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, we realized we were weeks away from being out of food. The people of this vault grew restless and started rioting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我们意识到我们距离没有食物还有几周的时间。这个金库的人变得焦躁不安，开始暴动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They blamed my father, even though he had tried for two decades to fix our problems. They brutally murdered both him... and my mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们责怪我父亲，尽管他已经尝试了二十年来解决我们的问题。他们残忍地杀害了他……还有我的母亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was at that point that I knew I had to do something. Me and my group of supporters managed to restore order, and I took over as overseer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在那时，我知道我必须做点什么。我和我的一群支持者设法恢复了秩序，我接任监督者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A month after my father's death, a trader from the town of Godfrey came upon our Vault and released the door from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲去世一个月后，戈弗雷镇的一名商人来到我们的避难所，从外面打开了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said that this was his first time in the area, but the distress signal could easily be heard by anyone that passed through the area regularly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说这是他第一次到该地区，但任何经常经过该地区的人都可以很容易地听到求救信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trader said that this was a path that was regularly traveled by people heading north from a city by the name of the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位贸易商说，这是人们经常从一个名为地下铁路的城市向北行驶的路径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it was at this point that I realized that we had been blatantly ignored. Left to die. Cast out. And my parents were slaughtered because of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以就在这一点上，我意识到我们被公然忽视了。自生自灭。驱逐。我的父母也因此被屠杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you understand... you aren't exactly in much of a position to argue. Now please, listen to my story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你不明白……你完全没有资格争论。现在请听我的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At that age, I heard a lot, seeing as how my father was the Overseer of this Vault. It started with problems with the water chip and low food stores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那个年纪，我听到了很多，看到我父亲是这个避难所的监督者。它始于水芯片和低食品商店的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, over the years it quickly grew into a much larger problem. The water chip finally broke, and we were on our last rations of food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，多年来，它迅速发展成为一个更大的问题。水片终于断了，我们吃到了最后的食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, my father had been working towards getting us out of here. He broadcast a distress signal every day, hoping it would reach the surface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来，我父亲一直在努力让我们离开这里。他每天都发出求救信号，希望它能够到达水面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When that didn't work, we started tunneling past our vault's walls. Luckily for us, there was quite a bit of equipment suited for digging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这不起作用时，我们开始在我们的金库墙壁上挖隧道。对我们来说幸运的是，有相当多的设备适合挖掘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, we realized that we were weeks away from being out of food. The people of this Vault grew restless and started rioting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我们意识到我们距离没有食物还有几周的时间。这个避难所的人变得焦躁不安，开始暴动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They blamed my father, even though he had tried for two decades to fix our problems. They brutally murdered him and my mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们责怪我父亲，尽管他已经尝试了二十年来解决我们的问题。他们残忍地杀害了他和我的母亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was at this point I had to do something. Me and my group of friends managed to restore order, and I took over as overseer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是在这一点上，我不得不做点什么。我和我的一群朋友设法恢复了秩序，我接任监督。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A month after my father's death, a trader from the town of Godfrey came upon our Vault and released the door from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲去世一个月后，戈弗雷镇的一名商人来到我们的避难所，从外面打开了门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said that this was his first time in the area, but the distress signal could easily be heard by anyone that passed through the area regularly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说这是他第一次到该地区，但任何经常经过该地区的人都可以很容易地听到求救信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trader said this was a path that was regularly traveled by people heading north from a city by the name of the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位贸易商说，这是人们经常从一个名为地下铁路的城市向北行驶的路径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it was at this point that I realized that we had been blatantly ignored. Left to die. Cast out. And my parents were slaughtered because of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以就在这一点上，我意识到我们被公然忽视了。自生自灭。驱逐。我的父母也因此被屠杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand. Why couldn't you open the Vault door from the inside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。为什么你不能从里面打开避难所的门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was no console on the inside of the Vault to open the door. It had to be opened from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所内部没有控制台可以打开门。它必须从外面打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door is essentially a two foot thick piece of steel, so drilling through it wasn't an option. So we tried to dig to the surface instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门本质上是一块两英尺厚的钢，所以钻穿它不是一种选择。所以我们试图挖掘到表面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how did you survive such a small food supply?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你是如何在这么少的食物供应中生存下来的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We simply ate less. Quite a few of us died from starvation, but nobody resorted to cannibalism or anything like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只是吃得少了。我们当中有不少人死于饥饿，但没有人诉诸自相残杀之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But why slaughter the lives of innocents?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是为什么要屠杀无辜者的生命呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Innocents? Apparently I didn't make it clear. This isn't as black and white as you think, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无辜者？显然我没有说清楚。这不像你想的那样非黑即白，新手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey

ESP.ORIGINAL: Godfrey was the one who opened the door. We have nothing against them, in fact we would like to consider them our allies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈弗雷是打开门的人。我们没有反对他们，事实上我们愿意将他们视为我们的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Underground Railroad can rot in hell. My parents along with countless others died because they didn't feel the need to deal with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是地下铁路会在地狱里腐烂。我的父母和无数其他人都死了，因为他们觉得没有必要与我们打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you see, we do not kill without reason. Those who did not aid us in our time of need will burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你看，我们不会无故杀人。那些在我们需要的时候没有帮助我们的人会被烧死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you expect me to just believe this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你希望我相信这一点？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect you to at least hear me out. I have seen what you've done, what you are capable of. I want you fighting for us, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你至少能听我说完。我看到了你所做的，你的能力。我要你为我们而战，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, we're preparing for an invasion. We've almost broken through to a metro tunnel- a tunnel that eventually leads to the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我们正在为入侵做准备。我们几乎突破了一条地铁隧道——一条最终通往地下铁路的隧道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, I want to hear the rest of what you have to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续，我想听听你要说的其他内容。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's good to hear. You could be invaluable to us in the near future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，很高兴听到。在不久的将来，您可能对我们非常宝贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, we're preparing for an invasion. We've almost broken through to a metro tunnel- a tunnel that eventually leads to the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我们正在为入侵做准备。我们几乎突破了一条地铁隧道——一条最终通往地下铁路的隧道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So after you break through, then what? You attack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么突破之后呢？你攻击？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we follow the tunnel north until we reach the Underground Railroad. Then we strike from the inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我们沿着隧道向北直到我们到达地下铁路。然后我们从内部攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hartrick will never see us coming. We'll finally be able to rid this town of the scum that has been bringing it down for years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈特里克永远不会看到我们来。我们终于能够摆脱多年来一直拖垮这座城市的败类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But enough talk. We need somebody like you with experience, and the grit to get things done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是说够了。我们需要像你这样有经验的人，以及把事情做好的勇气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a choice to make. A choice that could potentially change the fate of Alton forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一个选择。一个可能永远改变奥尔顿命运的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do the people of Alton call you the Plague?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么奥尔顿的人称你为瘟疫？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess they simply think that we act as a plague would, and honestly, that's a compliment. We strike fast, strike hard, and spread quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们只是认为我们会像瘟疫一样行事，老实说，这是一种恭维。我们出击快，出击狠，传播快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be sure to let Hartrick know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定会让哈特里克知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe me, you won't be letting Hartrick know anything. We'll strike from below, giving us a chance to catch him off-guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，你不会让哈特里克知道任何事情的。我们将从下方出击，让我们有机会让他措手不及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hartrick will never see us coming. We'll finally be able to rid this town of the scum that has been bringing it down for years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈特里克永远不会看到我们来。我们终于能够摆脱多年来一直拖垮这座城市的败类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But enough talk. We need somebody like you with experience, and the grit to get things done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是说够了。我们需要像你这样有经验的人，以及把事情做好的勇气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a choice to make. A choice that could potentially change the fate of Alton forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一个选择。一个可能永远改变奥尔顿命运的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you've gone through is unbelievable. I'll fight for the Plague.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你所经历的令人难以置信。我会为瘟疫而战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's what I like to hear! Someone with sense, someone who is willing to reason. Now come, newcomer, we have much to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这就是我喜欢听的！有理智的人，愿意讲道理的人。来吧，新人，我们有很多事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no excuse for what you have done. I fight for the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的所作所为没有任何借口。我为地下铁路而战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well then. I truly believe you could have been different. Goodbye, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。我真的相信你可能会有所不同。再见，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D398C32]AltonMQ02) Finding Godfrey EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right beyond this wall is the metro tunnel that will lead us north. Like I said, Hartrick will never see us coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在这堵墙的后面，就是通往北方的地铁隧道。就像我说的，哈特里克永远不会看到我们来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is where we previously spent most of our time tunneling upwards. We've since removed the scaffolding and equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们之前花费大部分时间向上挖掘的地方。我们已经拆除了脚手架和设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And this is where we initially broke through the Vault walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们最初突破避难所墙壁的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are the main living quarters of our residents here. Most of our residents left after I took control, or are simply on scouting missions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是我们这里居民的主要居住区。我们的大多数居民在我控制后离开了，或者只是在执行侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a bazaar of sorts. Be wary, there's a guard watching up above day and night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个集市。小心点，上面有守卫日夜守候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is our cafeteria. Whether you need food or beer, you'll find it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们的食堂。无论您需要食物还是啤酒，都可以在这里找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well thanks. It's gotten a bit run down over the years, but we've had a lot to deal with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。这些年来，它已经有点破旧了，但我们有很多事情要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It reminds me of the Vault grew up in. I like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它让我想起了在避难所长大的地方。我喜欢它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've had more important things to deal with over the past few years. At least we managed to scrub the graffiti from the riots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在过去的几年里，我们有更重要的事情要处理。至少我们设法清除了骚乱中的涂鸦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It could certainly use a good scrubbing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它当然可以使用良好的擦洗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's a bit harsh, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这有点苛刻，你不觉得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is literally the worst shithole I've ever been in in my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这简直是??我这辈子去过的最糟糕的狗屎洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens now is vital. You're going to go back to the Underground Railroad, lie to Hartrick's face, and sabotage the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在发生的事情至关重要。你要回到地下铁路，当着哈特里克的面撒谎，破坏这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll tell him that we captured you, but you managed to escape. Say anything necessary to get the proper clearance to certain parts of the Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会告诉他我们抓住了你，但你设法逃脱了。说出任何必要的事情来获得铁路某些部分的适当许可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need to sabotage their water and food supply, and deactivate any security systems present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要破坏他们的水和食物供应，并关闭所有存在的安全系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is all working towards our final goal- a full-blown invasion. We want as little standing in the way as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都在朝着我们的最终目标——全面入侵而努力。我们希望尽可能少地挡道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So- do you think you can handle it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以——你觉得你能应付吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would expect no less. Feel free to stop for a drink and stock up on supplies, but come back to me when this is all finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会期待不少。随时停下来喝一杯并储存用品，但是当这一切都完成后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are vials of... er... just put one in the water and one in the food, it'll be sure to get them sick. Good luck, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有几瓶……呃……只要把一个放在水里，一个放在食物里，肯定会让他们生病。祝你好运，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thirsty. I'll do it later.
Sure, stock up on supplies or grab a drink, but again, this is vital for our success. Return to me once you've done all of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，储备物资或喝一杯，但同样，这对我们的成功至关重要。完成所有这些后回到我身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are vials of... er... just put one in the water and one in the food, it'll be sure to get them sick. Good luck, newcomer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有几瓶……呃……只要把一个放在水里，一个放在食物里，肯定会让他们生病。祝你好运，新人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, what do you want to know?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to clear the Super Mutants out of Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法清除了老戈弗雷的超级变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You cleared out all of Old Godfrey? Now that's impressive. Has Robert given you the keys to his ride yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你清除了所有的？现在这令人印象深刻。罗伯特给你他骑车的钥匙了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... I killed some mutants. Not much exciting happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……我杀了一些变种人。没有发生太多令人兴奋的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much exciting happened? I'd call clearing out a town of ten feet tall monsters is pretty exciting. Has Robert given you the keys to his ride yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有发生什么令人兴奋的事情？我认为清理一个有十英尺高的怪物的小镇是非常令人兴奋的。罗伯特给你他骑车的钥匙了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not yet, he says it's not ready for the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没有，他说还没有准备好上路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, well, he must have his reasons. For the time being, you could help out around here. I have a small job for you to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好吧，他一定有他的理由。暂时，你可以在这里帮忙。我有一个小工作要你做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water line has been leaking for a while now. It all gets pumped in from a natural spring we found a few years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都来自我们最近发现的天然泉水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could fix it for us, that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能为我们修好它，那就太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, uh... he said it needs a new fusion... prism... device.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，呃……他说它需要一个新的融合……棱镜……装置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. Why are you acting so jumpy? Anyway, there's not too much for you to do around here yet. Oh, well actually, there is something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。你为什么表现得这么急躁？不管怎样，你在这里做的事情还不算多。哦，其实，有些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water line has been leaking for a while now. It all gets pumped in from a natural spring we found a few years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都来自我们最近发现的天然泉水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could fix it for us, that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能为我们修好它，那就太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'd be happy to fix it.
Great. Here's the key. The cave is towards the end of the tunnel. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伟大的。这是关键。洞穴就在隧道的尽头。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure you're okay? You're acting a bit off today. Anyway, here's the key. Hurry back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定你没事？你今天的表现有点不对劲。无论如何，这是关键。快回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our first plan of attack is to sabotage. We need somebody, maybe you, to sneak into Vault 59 and really fuck their day up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的第一个攻击计划是破坏。我们需要有人，也许是你，潜入 59 号避难所，让他们的日子过得真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Specifically, sabotaging their computer systems, water supply, and maybe even food supply too. We even have rumors they even have a GECK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 具体来说，破坏他们的计算机系统、供水，甚至可能还有食物供应。我们甚至有传言说他们甚至有 GECK。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their GECK could be providing them with water, maybe even a food supply. We think it may be what's caused the sudden abundance of life in the west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的 GECK 可以为他们提供水，甚至可能是食物供应。我们认为这可能是导致西方生活突然丰富的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While the growth in the west is obviously a great thing, taking out the Plague is our number one priority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然西部的增长显然是一件好事，但消灭瘟疫是我们的第一要务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of security do we have in case of an attempt to invade us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人企图入侵我们，我们有什么样的安全保障？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our first line of defense is our security doors. Our security codes are encrypted many times over, making them impossible to crack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的第一道防线是我们的安全门。我们的安全代码经过多次加密，无法破解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next, we have security checkpoints along each entrance. We blocked the one that came in from the utility tunnel, so that one's covered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来，我们在每个入口都有安全检查站。我们挡住了从公用隧道进来的那个，这样一个就被遮盖住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And finally, we have turrets along our biggest weak point, a metro tunnel that runs close to Vault 59. But that tunnel was sealed long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，我们在最大的弱点上安装了炮塔，这是一条靠近 59 号避难所的地铁隧道。但这条隧道很久以前就被封锁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it would be easy for the Plague to break through via the metro tunnel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么瘟疫通过地铁隧道很容易突破吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, yes, but the good thing, though, is that nobody else knows about it but us. The tunnel has been blocked off since the Great War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，是的，但好的一面是，除了我们之外，没有其他人知道这件事。自大战以来，隧道已被封锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only place the tunnel spits out is here, through some utility tunnels. Luckily, those are both very well sealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隧道吐出的唯一地方就是这里，通过一些公用隧道。幸运的是，它们都密封得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if somebody managed to find a second entrance to the tunnel and get through the doors, we'd have little chance of stopping an invasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果有人设法找到隧道的第二个入口并穿过大门，我们就几乎没有机会阻止入侵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their security is offline, their water tainted, and their food spoiled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的安全处于离线状态，他们的水被污染了，他们的食物变质了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's a reward. Now we can finally move towards getting in. We've got one problem, though... we don't have the explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错，奖励来了现在我们终于可以进入了。不过我们有一个问题……我们没有炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beyond a wall in the caves below lies a metro tunnel that will lead us to the Underground Railroad. We're going to need to remove this wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在下面洞穴中的一堵墙之外，有一条地铁隧道将我们引向地下铁路。我们需要拆除这堵墙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to need a lot of explosives, but not of the standard variety. What we need a lot of C-4.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将需要大量炸药，但不是标准种类的炸药。我们需要很多C-4。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, the only place in Alton where any would be is in prime Deathclaw territory... at the old Alton Quarry. Think you can handle it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，奥尔顿唯一的地方是死亡爪的黄金地段……在旧的奥尔顿采石场。你觉得你能应付吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'd run from Deathclaws? I'm pretty sure it's the other way around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为我会逃离死亡爪吗？我很确定情况正好相反。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's what I like to hear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这就是我喜欢听的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old quarry is in northeastern Alton, a ways north of New Godfrey. Unfortunately, it's not as easy as just going in and grabbing the C-4.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧采石场位于奥尔顿东北部，新戈弗雷以北。不幸的是，这并不像进入并拿到C-4那么容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to have to head into the old Brotherhood bunker that's in the quarry. When they set up camp, they cleared the quarry of it's equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您将不得不前往采石场中的旧兄弟会掩体。当他们建立营地时，他们清理了采石场的设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be able to find the explosives somewhere in there. When you find them, report back to me, and we'll get to work on this wall. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在那里的某个地方找到炸药。当你找到他们时，向我报告，我们将开始在这堵墙上工作。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Deathclaws! You've got to be kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？死爪！你在开玩笑吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old quarry is in northeastern Alton, a ways north of New Godfrey. Unfortunately, it's not as easy as just going in and grabbing the C-4.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧采石场位于奥尔顿东北部，新戈弗雷以北。不幸的是，这并不像进入并拿到C-4那么容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to have to head into the old Brotherhood bunker that's in the quarry. When they set up camp, they cleared the quarry of it's equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您将不得不前往采石场中的旧兄弟会掩体。当他们建立营地时，他们清理了采石场的设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be able to find the explosives somewhere in there. When you find them, report back to me, and we'll get to work on this wall. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在那里的某个地方找到炸药。当你找到他们时，向我报告，我们将开始在这堵墙上工作。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Underground Railroad plans to sabotage the city in the same way we did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地下铁路计划以与我们相同的方式破坏城市。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we'll erect security around the entrance. Anybody without a card won't be able to enter. Have you lowered their defenses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我们将在入口周围设置安全措施。任何没有卡的人都无法进入。你降低了他们的防御吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0D14C65F]AltonMQPlague) Double Agent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their security is offline, their water tainted, and their food spoiled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的安全处于离线状态，他们的水被污染了，他们的食物变质了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even know what to say! You have to be the kindest person I have ever met. Thanks again, you won't regret this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不知道该说什么！你必须是我见过的最善良的人。再次感谢，您不会后悔的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what. Here's a thousand caps. Take it, go to Hartrick, and buy a room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你什么。这里有一千个瓶盖。拿着它，去哈特里克，买一个房间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to rid Old Godfrey of the Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法摆脱了老戈弗雷的超级变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, just as I would expect. And Robert? Did he find you a ride home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，正如我所期望的那样。罗伯特?他找你搭车回家吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shot some Super Mutants. In the face. They proceeded to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我射杀了一些超级变种人。在脸上。他们继续死去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... that's what usually happens. Anyways, what about Robert? Did he find you a ride home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的……这就是通常发生的事情。不管怎样，罗伯特呢？他找你搭车回家吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says his truck isn't quite ready for the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他的卡车还没有准备好上路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, well, I'm sure it will be soon enough. And did anything else happen while you were away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好吧，我相信它会很快的。你不在的时候还有什么事情发生吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says his truck needs a prism... fusion... coil... reflector... device.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他的卡车需要一个棱镜……聚变……线圈……反射器……装置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy, that sure did make you sound smart. Did anything else happen while you were away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 男孩，这确实让你听起来很聪明。你不在的时候还发生了什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was captured by the Plague. Stephen Clark plans to throw everything he has at the Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被瘟疫俘虏了。斯蒂芬克拉克计划把他所有的东西都扔到铁路上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're... they're planning to invade? Then we need to get started right away on what I've been planning. We're going to turn the tables on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是……他们打算入侵？然后我们需要立即开始我的计划。我们要扭转局面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our first step is to sabotage anything that could give them the upper hand, but that can't be done without getting into Vault 59.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的第一步是破坏任何可能让他们占上风的东西，但如果不进入 59 号避难所就无法做到这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard rumors that a group of Plague outcasts have been hanging near Vault 59. You need to find them and convince them to let you into the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说有一群瘟疫流放者在 59 号避难所附近被吊死。你需要找到他们并说服他们让你进城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you get in, head for their computer systems. We need logs of anything you can find. Just download them to your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你进入，前往他们的计算机系统。我们需要你能找到的任何东西的日志。只需将它们下载到您的 Pip-Boy。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've also learned that Vault 59 has a GECK. Their GECK is what's caused the abundance of life in the western forests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还了解到59号避难所有一个 GECK。他们的 GECK 是造成西部森林丰富生命的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, you're going to have to destroy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，你将不得不摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy the only chance the Wasteland has for a fresh start? Hell no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁废土重新开始的唯一机会？一定不行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's either some trees and bugs or us. Look, you may not have to destroy the GECK, but as long as you can disable the water purification, we're good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么是一些树木和虫子，要么是我们。看，你可能不必摧毁 GECK，但只要你能禁用水净化，我们就很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can stop the water purification, then that means less of them firing at us, and more of them puking their guts out in a toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们可以停止水净化，那意味着它们向我们开火的数量会减少，而更多的它们会在厕所里吐出它们的内脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you can do those two things, we'll have a good chance of invading them before they even have a chance to invade us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你能做到这两件事，我们就有很大的机会在他们有机会入侵我们之前入侵他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, newcomer. I hope to see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，新人。我希望很快能见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it has to be done, then so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果必须这样做，那就这样吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you understand. You might not have to destroy it, but if you have the skill, than you might be able to disable only the water purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你能理解。您可能不必破坏它，但如果您有技能，那么您可能只能禁用净水器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can stop the water purification, then that means less of them firing at us, and more of them puking their guts out in a toilet.
