ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们可以停止水净化，那意味着它们向我们开火的数量会减少，而更多的它们会在厕所里吐出它们的内脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you can do those two things, we'll have a good chance of invading them before they even have a chance to invade us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你能做到这两件事，我们就有很大的机会在他们有机会入侵我们之前入侵他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, newcomer. I hope to see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，新人。我希望很快能见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you once a member of the Plague?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经是瘟疫的一员吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the one asking the questions, not you! Now I won't ask again, who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是问问题的人，不是你！现在我不会再问了，你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm somebody who wants the same thing you do. Kill the bastards of Vault 59.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个想要你做同样事情的人。杀死 59 号避难所的混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... interesting. What are you proposing?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I plan to sneak in and sabotage anything possible as preparation for an assault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我计划潜入并破坏任何可能的东西，为袭击做准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like your way of thinking. Yeah, sure, I have a set of our old armor you could borrow, but it's gonna cost you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你的思维方式。是的，当然，我有一套我们的旧盔甲，你可以借，但要花你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll sell it to you for say... 400 caps. Sound fair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把它卖给你说... 400 瓶盖。听起来公平吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sneak in. Break shit. Kill everybody in there later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜入。打破狗屎。以后杀光里面的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you're more brawn than brains. But sure, I have a set of armor you could use, but it'll cost you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你比头脑更强壮。但可以肯定的是，我有一套你可以使用的盔甲，但它会花费你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll sell it to you for say... 400 caps. Sound fair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把它卖给你说... 400 瓶盖。听起来公平吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. As long as you keep this on and don't say much, I'd say you have a pretty good chance of getting in and out without being noticed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伟大的。只要你保持这个状态并且不说太多，我会说你很有可能在不被注意的情况下进出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see the Plague wiped out as much as you do, so good luck. Give Stephen Clark an extra kick to the balls if you have a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望看到瘟疫像你一样被消灭，祝你好运。如果你有机会的话，给斯蒂芬克拉克一个额外的踢球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and take this old ID card of mine. This'll get you in pretty much anywhere... I used to work in the GECK lab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，拿我的这张旧身份证。这几乎可以让你进入任何地方......我曾经在 GECK 实验室工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. As long as you keep this on and don't say much, I'd say you have a pretty good chance of getting in and out without being noticed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伟大的。只要你保持这个状态并且不说太多，我会说你很有可能在不被注意的情况下进出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see the Plague wiped out as much as you do, so good luck. Give Stephen Clark an extra kick to the balls if you have a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望看到瘟疫像你一样被消灭，祝你好运。如果你有机会的话，给斯蒂芬克拉克一个额外的踢球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have the money right now.
Not my problem. When you have the money, come see me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我的问题。有钱就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about 200 caps? I know you can't wait to see the Plague wiped out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 200个瓶盖怎么样？我知道你迫不及待地想看到瘟疫被消灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a point. 200 caps it is, then.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and take this old ID card of mine. There's so many of us that whoever might stop you at the door probably won't recognize my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，拿我的这张旧身份证。我们这么多人，可能会在门口拦住你的人可能不会认出我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a point. Come see me when you have the 200 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一定道理。当你有200个瓶盖时来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The offer still stands at 400 caps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The offer still stands at 200 caps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything to trade?
Nope. We've been living off the land- eating berries and Mole Rats, gathering water from the pond, stuff like that. We don't have much to trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。我们一直靠吃陆地的浆果和鼹鼠为生，从池塘里收集水，诸如此类。我们没有太多可交易的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have against the Plague?
What do I have against them? Have you not seen what they do? How they destroy lives and tear apart families?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有什么反对他们的？你没见过他们做什么吗？他们如何摧毁生命并撕裂家庭？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I disagreed with Stephen Clark's methodology, so me and a group of others asked him to stop. He didn't take well to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不同意斯蒂芬克拉克的方法，所以我和其他一群人要求他停下来。他对此并不满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And one of us- Devin- didn't make it. Stephen shot him. No sympathy, no mercy, nothing. That's when we left. We had had enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我们中的一个——德文——没有成功。斯蒂芬开枪打死了他。没有同情，没有怜悯，什么都没有。那是我们离开的时候。我们受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck with your quest... and give Stephen a kick to the balls for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你的任务好运……替我踢斯蒂芬球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Plague Outcast [0D4332E9] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said that if he lets you stay in the station, he wants 50% of the profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说如果他让你留在车站，他要50%的利润。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fifty percent... that's a lot of money. But I'll surely be able to make enough to buy a room. And remember, you won't regret doing this for me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 百分之五十……这是一大笔钱。但我肯定能赚到足够买一个房间的钱。记住，你不会后悔为我做这件事的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said that if he lets you stay in the station, he wants 50% of the profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说如果他让你留在车站，他要50%的利润。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a big cut... but I'll eventually make enough to buy a room of my own. Here's 200 caps for your trouble. And again, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个很大的削减......但我最终会赚到足够买一个我自己的房间。这里有 200 个上限来解决您的麻烦。再次感谢您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said that if he lets you stay in the station, he wants 50% of the profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说如果他让你留在车站，他要50%的利润。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fifty percent... that's a lot of money. But I'll might eventually be able to make enough to buy a room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 百分之五十……这是一大笔钱。但我可能最终能够赚到足够的钱买一个房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as I promised, here's the 500 caps. It certainly isn't making saving for a room any easier, but a deal is a deal. Thanks again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我所承诺的，这是 500 个上限。这当然不会让节省房间变得更容易，但交易就是交易。再次感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Randolph [0D15CE21] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, I don't know the details. But what I do know is that Stephen messed up. Bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我不知道细节。但我所知道的是斯蒂芬搞砸了。坏的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We captured this guy... honestly, I don't know what's special about him, but Stephen saw something in him. Thought he could help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们抓住了这个人……老实说，我不知道他有什么特别之处，但斯蒂芬在他身上看到了一些东西。以为他能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had already escaped once before, at Belleview. Rumor has it that he was on that plane that crashed downtown... and survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他之前已经逃过一次，在贝尔维尤。有传言说他在坠毁在市中心的那架飞机上……幸存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yeah, he escaped. Stephen offered for him to join us, and he pretty much gave us the middle finger and left. So much for diplomacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，是的，他逃脱了。斯蒂芬提议让他加入我们，他几乎给了我们中指然后离开了。外交就这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... don't recognize the name. But hell, we're so spread out nowadays that I probably don't even know half of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……不认识名字。但见鬼，我们现在太分散了，我可能连我们一半都不认识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this new ID. Soon we'll have turrets along this entrance... make sure you have your ID on you, otherwise the turrets will turn hostile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，拿着这个新身份证。很快我们将在这个入口处设置炮塔……确保你有你的身份证，否则炮塔会变成敌对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel free to keep the old one. Not of much use now, but a good keepsake, I guess. Head on inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随意保留旧的。现在用处不大，但我猜是一个很好的纪念品。头朝内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plague Guard [0D43A99F] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their computer turned out to be quite the information cache.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明，他们的计算机完全是信息缓存。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great to hear. And the G.E.C.K.?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到这个消息我很高兴。还有 G.E.C.K.？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The server had a cache of data, which unfortunately for them wasn't encrypted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 服务器有一个数据缓存，不幸的是他们没有加密。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, we'll have Tom take a look at it. And what about the G.E.C.K.?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，我们会让汤姆看看。那么 G.E.C.K. 呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you did what had to be done. Like I said, I think our lives are more important than a few trees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你做了必须做的事。就像我说的，我认为我们的生命比几棵树更重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your reward. We're one step closer to putting an end to this, thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的奖励。多亏了你，我们离结束这一点又近了一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the logs to Tom Howard. He should be able to find some info based on the coordinates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把日志交给汤姆霍华德。他应该能够根据坐标找到一些信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, I had to destroy the G.E.C.K.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我不得不摧毁 G.E.C.K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, well, that's good to hear. You managed to not only cripple the Plague, but also save the forests out west... now that's impressive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，嗯，很高兴听到。你不仅成功地削弱了瘟疫，还拯救了西部的森林……这令人印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your reward. We're one step closer to putting an end to this, thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的奖励。多亏了你，我们离结束这一点又近了一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the logs to Tom Howard. He should be able to find some info based on the coordinates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把日志交给汤姆霍华德。他应该能够根据坐标找到一些信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was able to disable the water purification without destroying the G.E.C.K.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能够在不破坏 G.E.C.K. 的情况下禁用水净化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you do around here?
I'm pretty much the local repairman... been doing it for forty-seven years! I can fix just about anything that needs fixing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几乎是当地的修理工……已经做了四十七年了！我几乎可以修复任何需要修复的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've got the caps, I'll fix it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有瓶盖，我会修理它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D028B02]AltonDialogueMetro) UR Dialogue, BISH! EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some server logs from Vault 59.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些来自59号避难所的服务器日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm... This is good. They have coordinates and everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……这很好。他们有坐标和一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These coordinates make it look like that old, abandoned metro tunnel runs right over the vault... which makes us getting in a lot easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些坐标使它看起来像那条废弃的旧地铁隧道就在拱顶上方……这使我们更容易进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, you look like a pretty hardy fellow. I've got some sensitive material that needs collected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，你看起来是个很坚强的人。我有一些需要收集的敏感材料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hardy? I'm a bit more than that.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of our trader friends saw a group of Plague members leaving the old Alton quarry with a crate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的一个交易员朋友看到一群瘟疫成员带着一个板条箱离开了旧的奥尔顿采石场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That crate was likely full of explosives, being from the quarry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个箱子很可能装满了炸药，来自采石场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And based on the location of Vault 59, they want to use that to punch a hole into the abandoned metro tunnel that links with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据 59 号避难所的位置，他们想用它在与我们相连的废弃地铁隧道上打一个洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to intercept the Plague members carrying that crate. This could be the difference between us winning and losing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你拦截携带那个板条箱的瘟疫成员。这可能是我们输赢的区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you pay me, I'll get what you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你付钱给我，我就能得到你需要的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you'll be paid, I wasn't about to rip you off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然会得到报酬，我不是要敲诈你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of our trader friends saw a group of Plague members leaving the old Alton quarry with a crate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的一个交易员朋友看到一群瘟疫成员带着一个板条箱离开了旧的奥尔顿采石场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That crate was likely full of explosives, being from the quarry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个箱子很可能装满了炸药，来自采石场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And based on the location of Vault 59, they want to use that to punch a hole into the abandoned metro tunnel that links with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据 59 号避难所的位置，他们想用它在与我们相连的废弃地铁隧道上打一个洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to intercept the Plague members carrying that crate. This could be the difference between us winning and losing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你拦截携带那个板条箱的瘟疫成员。这可能是我们输赢的区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C65E]AltonMQUR) Behind Enemy Lines EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, excellent! Here, take this. It's a laser rifle manual I wrote a few years ago... But obviously I don't see much action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，太好了！来，拿这个。这是我几年前写的激光步枪手册……但显然我没有看到太多动作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A99]AltonMQURSetup) Fight Fire With Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me two days to make the explosives, then meet us at the end of the abandoned metro tunnel. We'll be set up and ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我两天时间做炸药，然后在废弃的地铁隧道尽头与我们会合。我们将准备就绪并准备出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A99]AltonMQURSetup) Fight Fire With Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, relax. Grab a drink, explore Alton, whatever. You've deserved a bit of downtime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，放松一下。喝一杯，探索奥尔顿，无论如何。你应该得到一些停机时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tom Howard [0D43D5FC] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A99]AltonMQURSetup) Fight Fire With Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I need to take care of something first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我需要先处理一些事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough. Don't take too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很公平。不要花太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A99]AltonMQURSetup) Fight Fire With Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You son of a bitch. Do you have any idea how many lives you've destroyed? How many families you've torn apart? Do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个狗娘养的。你知道你毁了多少生命吗？你拆散了多少家庭？你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's it? You expected us to let a group of crazies out of a vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样了？你指望我们把一群疯子从保险库里放出来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to die, Stephen? Are you ready to face the fate that you have inflicted on so many others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好死了吗，斯蒂芬？你准备好面对你给这么多人施加的命运了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because of you, my father died, and we lost dozens of our own members.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你，我父亲死了，我们失去了几十个自己的成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're crazy, you alone are to blame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们疯了，你一个人是罪魁祸首。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've ruined everything. EVERY thing! I was so close, so close...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你毁了一切。一切！我离得那么近，那么近……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该……应该埋葬他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who, these abominations? They are less than human, heartless shells, free of any feeling or kindness. They will rot where they fell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁，这些可憎的东西？他们比人类还小，没有心肠，没有任何感情或善良。他们会在跌倒的地方腐烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's time that we help you. We must travel to Godfrey and speak with Robert about getting you home… that is, of course, if you want to go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是我们帮助您的时候了。我们必须前往戈弗雷并与罗伯特谈谈让你回家的事情——当然，如果你想回去的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. The bastards deserved every bullet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这些混蛋应该得到每一颗子弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They did indeed. Hopefully the dead residents of Belleview, Piasa Creek, and countless others can finally rest in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们确实做到了。希望 Belleview、Piasa Creek 和无数其他死去的居民最终能够安息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's time that we help you. We must travel to Godfrey and speak with Robert about getting you home... that is, of course, if you want to go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是我们帮助您的时候了。我们必须前往戈弗雷并与罗伯特谈谈让你回家的事情……当然，如果你想回去的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to head home, but I will return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要回家，但我会回来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, the Underground Railroad's doors will always be open. Now, off to New Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，地下铁路的大门永远是敞开的。现在，前往新戈弗雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After what I've been through, I can't wait to get back to the Capital.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在经历了这些之后，我迫不及待地想回到首都。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's certainly understandable. Now, off to New Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这当然可以理解。现在，前往新戈弗雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D14C661]AltonMQURFinale) The Final Stand EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robert, we've had our differences in the past, but it is time to set them aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伯特，我们过去曾有过分歧，但现在是时候把它们搁置一旁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伯特，瘟疫已经过去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. And the newcomer was key in their destruction. And from what I've heard, he even cleared out the ruins of Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。而新来者是他们毁灭的关键。而且据我所知，他甚至清理了老戈弗雷的废墟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. And the newcomer was key in their destruction. And from what I've heard, she even cleared out the ruins of Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。而新来者是他们毁灭的关键。而且据我所知，她甚至清理了老戈弗雷的废墟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hartrick. What are you doing in my town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈特里克。你在我镇上做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our friend here needs a ride back to DC, and I very well know you have one for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里的朋友需要搭车回华盛顿，我很清楚你有一辆要给他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our friend here needs a ride back to DC, and I very well know you have one for her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里的朋友需要搭车回华盛顿，我很清楚你有一辆要给她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Hartrick [0D021301] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, so I've heard… let's get to work. We need to head to the old radio station just south of here. Let's head out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，所以我听说了？让我们开始工作吧。我们需要前往南边的旧广播电台。我们出去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robert Johnson [0D186723] (mod) Quest : ([0D43216B]AltonMQUREndgame) A Dashboard Farewell EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. We will finally be ridding Alton of the unworthy. You, my friend, shall have the honor of pressing the button.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出色的。我们最终将摆脱不配的奥尔顿。你，我的朋友，将有幸按下按钮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A98]AltonMQPlagueSetup) Uncharted Territory EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we blast through, we should be safe until we get into the Railroad. After that, take no prisoners, shoot on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们爆炸时，我们应该是安全的，直到我们进入铁路。在那之后，不要俘虏，瞄准射击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stephen Clark [0D19E5A8] (mod) Quest : ([0D360A98]AltonMQPlagueSetup) Uncharted Territory EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and I don't like visitors. I've got enough going on here without random people poking around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我不喜欢访客。我已经受够了这里没有随机的人四处闲逛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Will Arnold [0D24F85D] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks! I have to leave now.
Just don't knock anything over on the way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出门的时候不要撞到东西...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Will Arnold [0D24F85D] (mod) Quest : ([0D18673B]AltonDialogueGodfrey) Godfrey Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have medical supplies you can sell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有可以卖的医疗用品吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I have some supplies that can patch you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有一些补给品可以治疗你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Tom Johnson [0D3FCEB7] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't guarantee it won't tear your guts apart, but fuck, go for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能保证它不会撕裂你的胆，但操，去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Linda Roberts [0D4205DE] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to buy and sell some stuff.
Well, this hoarder here is always looking for more, so have a peek at the stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这里的囤积者总是在寻找更多，所以看看库存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally Parker [0D3FEC63] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to try to fix some of my stuff up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想尝试修复我的一些东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad taught me everything I need to know, this'll be easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸教了我所有我需要知道的东西，这很容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sally Parker [0D3FEC63] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see what guns you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你有什么枪在卖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got more than that. Armor, weapons, ammo, whatever you need!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得到的不止这些。盔甲、武器、弹药，随你所需！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reed Smith [0D3E937E] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Reed Smith [0D3E937E] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let me see what you've got for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，让我看看你有什么要出售的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'll sell you what I have, but if you want better shit, go see Dr. Tom in the lab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我会把我所有的东西卖给你，但如果你想要更好的东西，去实验室找汤姆博士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ted Maher [0D3FDD91] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ted Maher [0D3FDD91] (mod) Quest : ([0D23B0CB]AltonDialogueV59) Vault 59 Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you'll need it more than I will.
You'd know best, wouldn't you? I have to go. Again... thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最清楚，不是吗？我得走了。再次谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... if you say so. I can't thank you enough, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧……如果你这么说。陌生人，我感激不尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. It's dangerous out here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I have to go. Before more of them come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我得走了。在他们更多人到来之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take that. Now get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会搞定的。现在离开这里。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll try to make it on my own. If I'm careful, I should be okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尝试自己做。如果我小心点，我应该没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, thank you again! I'm going to try to make it home... if it's still there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在此，再次感谢您！我会试着把它带回家……如果它还在的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : AltonFreedCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Neutral
Faction : AltonCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Fear
Faction : AltonCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Puzzled
Faction : AltonCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Fear
Faction : AltonCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Fear
Faction : AltonCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Puzzled
Faction : AltonCaptiveFACTION Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you again, I owe you my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你，我欠你一条命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Godfrey Settler [0D3CFF7A] (mod) Quest : ([0D475C07]AltonCaptiveDialog) AltonCaptivesDialog EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out who stole your equipment.
(Optional) Retrieve the black box from the plane.
Retrieve the key from the guard.
Grab your equipment from the locker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从储物柜中取出您的设备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Michael Douglas about your findings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与迈克尔道格拉斯谈谈你的发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find and fix all of the broken conductors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到并修复所有损坏的导体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Michael to the Underground Railroad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随迈克尔到地下铁路。
进入废弃的兄弟会地堡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find and locate the stash of explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查找并找到爆炸物的藏匿处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the purge console to unlock the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到净化控制台以解锁门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Vault 59 with the explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着炸药返回 59 号避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait two days for the explosives to be prepared.
Intercept the Plague Squad carrying the explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拦截携带炸药的瘟疫小队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate the explosives within the power station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到发电站内的爆炸物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring the C4 back to Tom Howard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把 C4 还给汤姆霍华德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait two days for the explosives to be prepared.
Shows objective marker for Hopp Hollow Farmstead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显示 霍普空心农庄 的目标标记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the gold necklace in the Hopp Hollow Cornfield.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在 霍普空心麦田 找到金项链。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find all the Supermutant's in Godfrey
ESP.TRADUIT: 在戈弗雷找到所有的超级变种人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way to the town of New Godfrey.
Get rid of the Super Mutants in Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摆脱老戈弗雷的超级变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate the Super Mutant camp and find the prisoners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到超级变种人营地并找到囚犯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the Plague facility... or don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃离瘟疫设施……或者不要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grab your things from the locker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从储物柜拿走你的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grab the knife and use it to kill the guard through the gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿起刀，用它杀死穿过大门的守卫。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start Endgame, Head off to New Godfrey
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始残局，前往新戈弗雷
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fight your way through the Underground Railroad.
The quest uses this stage, originally served zero function but now it handles objective markers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该任务使用此阶段，最初提供零功能，但现在它处理目标标记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate Linda Roberts' husband somewhere in the Godfrey metro tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在戈弗雷地铁隧道的某个地方找到琳达·罗伯茨的丈夫。
跟随 [name] 并了解他的日程安排。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set initial stage to get quest running upon completion of main quest. Had to completely remake this quest, meaning it will differ from the Fallout 3 version (if it even worked then). See notes in the quest script for details JD 2022-Feb-16
ESP.TRADUIT: 设置初始阶段以在完成主要任务后运行任务。必须完全重新制作这个任务，这意味着它将与辐射 3 版本不同（如果它当时有效的话）。详情请参阅任务脚本中的注释 JD 2022-Feb-16
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set this stage for the Plague ending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为瘟疫结局设置这个阶段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set this stage for the Underground Railroad ending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为地下铁路的结局设置这个阶段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 25 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set this stage when the Underground Railroad remnants are disposed of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当地下铁路残余物被处理掉时，设置这个阶段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 50 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set this stage when the Plague remnants are disposed of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在处理完瘟疫残留物后设置此阶段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 55 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Completes quest and gives player proper XP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成任务并给予玩家适当的 XP。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care of the Underground Railroad remnants at Last Chance Gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在 Last Chance Gas 处理地下铁路遗迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clear the Plague Rebels out of the camp north of the western forests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将瘟疫叛军清除出西部森林以北的营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way to the garage.
Check the houses in the area for the fuel cell controller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查该地区的房屋是否有燃料电池控制器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Hartrick and Meet Robert in New Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随 Hartrick 并在 New Godfrey 与 Robert 会面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way to the garage.
NO you need it more than I do
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0

ESP.TRADUIT: 把 Obongwa 的烤面包机拿来。
给 Obongwa 带来一种特殊的叉勺。
给 Obongwa 带来他的派对帽。
在他的洞穴中找到奥邦瓦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest that controls the gas mask for Vault 59's lab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为 59 号避难所的实验室控制防毒面具的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out who stole your equipment.
(Optional) Find out why your plane crashed.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）找出您的飞机坠毁的原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find and fix all of the broken conductors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到并修复所有损坏的导体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the key from the Berserker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从狂战士那里取回钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grab your equipment from the locker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从储物柜中取出您的设备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the tunnel that leads to the Dulles International Airport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到通往杜勒斯国际机场的隧道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way through the tunnel to the Dulles International Airport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过隧道前往杜勒斯国际机场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Board the plane to the west coast.
Return to Commander Atkins when you are ready to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好离开时，回到指挥官阿特金斯那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with the commander of the outpost.
Head down to the boiler room and see what the problem is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往锅炉房，看看问题出在哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start the water pump back up.
Return to Hartick and tell him of the repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到哈蒂克那里，告诉他修理情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way to the town of New Godfrey.
Get rid of the Super Mutants in Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摆脱老戈弗雷的超级变种人。
（可选）找到罗伯特约翰逊的狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the Plague facility... or don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃离瘟疫设施……或者不要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alton Worldspace Audio Marker move quest
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥尔顿世界空间音频标记移动任务
找到 Obongwa 的烤面包机。
找到 Obongwa 的派对便帽。
在他的洞穴中找到 Obongwa。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head to the Underground Railroad's water supply and fix the boiler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往地下铁路的供水处并修理锅炉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Hartick and tell him of the repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到哈蒂克那里，告诉他修理情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate the Plague outcasts hiding somewhere in the western forest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到隐藏在西部森林某处的瘟疫流放者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gain access to Vault 59's computer systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 访问 59号避难所的计算机系统。
摧毁 59 号避难所的 G.E.C.K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Instead, only cut off the G.E.C.K.'s water purification systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）相反，只切断 G.E.C.K. 的净水系统。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return and get info from Hartrick
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回并从 Hartrick 获取信息
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 25 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 30 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Hartrick and tell him all is "fixed"
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到哈特里克并告诉他一切都已“修复”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 35 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Steal Hartrick's terminal key from his tent
ESP.TRADUIT: 从帐篷里偷走哈特里克的终端钥匙
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 37 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 40 Index : 0

ESP.TRADUIT: 返回 V59 并听取汇报
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 50 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Stephen Clark on a tour of Vault 59.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随斯蒂芬克拉克参观 59 号避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Hartrick and try to get information from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回 Hartrick 并尝试从他那里获取信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sabotage the Underground Railroad's water and food supply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破坏地下铁路的水和食物供应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Replace the food supply with spoiled food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用变质的食物代替食物供应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search Hartrick's tent for the security key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在 Hartrick 的帐篷中搜索安全密钥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deactivate the Underground Railroad's security system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停用地下铁路的安全系统。
在 59 号避难所与斯蒂芬交谈。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put an end to Stephen's twisted plans
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束斯蒂芬的扭曲计划
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 30 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: End MQUR Finale ;needed to allow result processing to finish on stage 100
ESP.TRADUIT: End MQUR Finale ;需要允许结果处理在阶段 100 完成
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 110 Index : 0

ESP.TRADUIT: 进入斯蒂芬克拉克的办公室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest start Go Talk to Hartrick
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务开始 与哈特里克交谈
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 20 Index : 0
Quest Stage : 30 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest Fail if joined Plague and is not completed yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果加入瘟疫且尚未完成，则任务失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 105 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Hartrick about letting Frank in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和哈特里克谈谈让弗兰克进来的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frank says you won't regret it, and to give him a couple of days. What could that mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克说你不会后悔的，给他几天时间。那意味着什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trailer 2? WHAT!? TRAILER 3!? OH DEAR LORD!
ESP.TRADUIT: 预告片2？什么！？预告片3！？哦，亲爱的主！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tom Howard teaches you to handle energy weapons like a pro, raising your energy weapons skill by 5, and giving you +6% to Critical Chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤姆霍华德教你像专业人士一样处理能量武器，将你的能量武器技能提高 5 点，并为你提供 +6% 的暴击率。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The abandoned Brotherhood of Steel bunker lay before you, full of Deathclaws and radiation, and you fearlessly carved a path of destruction through the bunker to your final destination. Your fearless attitude has granted you a permanent +10 radiation resistance bonus, as well as a permanent +25% damage bonus against Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废弃的钢铁兄弟会地堡摆在你面前，充满了死亡爪和辐射，你无畏地开辟了一条穿过地堡通往最终目的地的毁灭之路。你的无畏态度使你获得了 10% 的辐射抗性和 25% 的对死亡爪的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you have wiped out the last major Plague remnants in Alton, the locals begin to revere you as somebody to look up to. You receive five points in both your Speech and Barter skills while in Alton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你在奥尔顿消灭了最后一批主要的瘟疫残余时，当地人开始将你视为值得尊敬的人。在奥尔顿期间，您的演讲和易货技能均获得 5 分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last of the Underground Railroad has been defeated- leaving the Plague as the undisputed winner in this final showdown. The citizens of Alton regard you as a traitor, but are certainly scared to cross your path. You receive +5 points to Speech, and +1 point to your Strength while in Alton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的地下铁路已经被击败——在这场最后的对决中，瘟疫成为无可争议的赢家。奥尔顿的市民视你为叛徒，但肯定害怕越过你的道路。在奥尔顿时，您的言语获得 5 分，力量获得 1 分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some damn bandits have been squatting somewhere along the path between here and Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些该死的土匪一直蹲在这里和老戈弗雷之间的小路上的某个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This door has been disabled until the bunker has been purged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在清除掩体之前，此门已被禁用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The console is not active at this time.
Vault 59 G.E.C.K. Labs identification card required.
ESP.TRADUIT: 59 号避难所 G.E.C.K.需要实验室身份证。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
With a science skill of 75 or higher, you could disable the G.E.C.K.'s water purification systems instead of destroying it completely. Alternately, a few gunshots could probably take care of the device.
Destroying it could have negative effects on the abundance of life in the forest above, whereas shutting off the water purifier would only make the residents of Vault 59 sick and nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT:
拥有 75 或更高的科学技能，您可以禁用 G.E.C.K. 的水净化系统，而不是完全摧毁它。或者，几声枪响可能会损坏该设备。
破坏它可能会对上方森林的丰富生命产生负面影响，而关闭净水器只会让 59 号避难所的居民生病，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut down the water purification. (Science Skill Not High Enough)
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭净水器。 （科学技能不够高）

ESP.ORIGINAL: The G.E.C.K. appears to be functioning enough to keep the forest alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: G.E.C.K.似乎功能足以让森林保持活力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tom Howard teaches you to handle energy weapons like a pro, raising your Energy Weapons skill by 5, and giving you a 3 percent boost to scoring a critical hit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤姆霍华德教你像专业人士一样处理能量武器，将你的能量武器技能提高 5 点，并让你获得 3% 的暴击得分提升。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The abandoned Brotherhood of Steel bunker lay before you, full of Deathclaws and radiation, and you fearlessly carved a path of destruction through the bunker to your final destination. Your fearless attitude has granted you a permanent +10 radiation resistance bonus, as well as a permanent +25% damage bonus against Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废弃的钢铁兄弟会地堡摆在你面前，充满了死亡爪和辐射，你无畏地开辟了一条穿过地堡通往最终目的地的毁灭之路。你的无畏态度使你获得了 10% 的辐射抗性和 25% 的对死亡爪的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should grab the knife off the table.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该把刀从桌子上拿下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This hat is glowing red. Hats are not supposed to be sources of lights. You should probably leave this alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这顶帽子是红色的。帽子不应该是光源。您可能应该不理会它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This toaster clearly has powers beyond the control of an average human. You should leave it be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个烤面包机显然具有超出普通人控制的能力。你应该离开它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to carry around a gigantic spork? Just leave it here, it is of no use to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想随身携带一个巨大的叉勺吗？把它留在这里，它对你没有用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wake up, and your head hurts. All you can remember is flashing lights and the wind in your face. You have no idea where you are, but you see smoke rising up in the distance. You should investigate- find out where you are, and why you're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你醒来，你的头很痛。你能记住的只是闪烁的灯光和你脸上的风。你不知道自己在哪里，但你看到远处升起烟雾。你应该调查——找出你在哪里，以及你为什么在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frank is throwing a grand opening for his new store next to Jared Bensman's store.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克正在贾里德·本斯曼 (Jared Bensman) 的商店旁边为他的新店举行盛大的开业典礼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've learned that sometimes it is best to run away from your problems. You have received a permanent +1 boost to your Agility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经了解到，有时最好逃避你的问题。你的敏捷获得了永久性的 +1 点提升。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Learning about the explosions that rocked the plane leaves you with a better understanding of the ones that you cause yourself. Your Explosives skill has been permanently increased by 5.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解震撼飞机的爆炸可以让您更好地了解自己造成的爆炸。你的炸药技能永久提高了 5 点。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have received a radio transmission from an unknown source containing a series of analog RobCo terminal symbols. The message states:
"This is Commander Atkins, requesting assistance with a high-priority rescue mission. Any Outcasts listening on this frequency, respond immediately. Use the emergency tunnel near Rivet City."
How one expects a person to translate that signal without specialized hardware such as a Pip-Boy, it is unknown. However, you make a note to investigate anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT:
您收到了来自未知的无线电传输，其中包含模拟来源 RobCo 终端符号。消息来源：
“我是阿特金斯指挥官，请求协助执行一项高优先级的救援任务。任何收听此频率的流放者，请立即响应。使用铆钉城附近的紧急隧道。”
人们如何期望一个人在没有诸如 Pip-Boy 之类的专用硬件的情况下翻译该信号，这是未知的。但是，您无论如何都要记下调查。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear something big moving back upstairs. That may have been the grate that leads to the other tunnel exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到有什么大东西在楼上移动。那可能是通往另一个隧道出口的格栅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This broken conductor might be the source of the Metro power outage. I should try to fix them and see what happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这根断线可能是地铁停电的根源。我应该尝试修复它们，看看会发生什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can now finish Dr. Russell's quest. Yay!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在可以完成拉塞尔博士的任务了。耶！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You survived the plane crash!
Unfortunately, your companions did not.
You can find their belongings at the site of the plane crash to the north.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你在飞机失事中幸存下来！
不幸的是，你的同伴没有。
您可以在北部的飞机失事现场找到他们的物品。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A note is left tied to your arm, it says-
"Welcome, stranger. We saw you fall from the airship, and we thought you were surely dead. You are not. We have taken your things- for the time being. You will find us in the farmhouse not far from here. You have been dressed accordingly. We will be waiting."
ESP.TRADUIT:
一张纸条绑在你的手臂上，上面写着——
“欢迎，陌生人。我们看到你从飞艇上掉下来，我们以为你肯定死了。你没有。我们拿走了你的东西——暂时。你会在离这里不远的农舍找到我们。你有穿着相应的衣服。我们会等待的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
And so ends the story I have so far. The quest you're doing (Getting to Godfrey) hasn't been finished yet, so don't bother trying to find Old Godfrey. There will be at least three more quests in the main quest. The next one involves your capture by the Plague, and your decision to join them or escape the facility. The next 2 quests you receive will be based off of that choice. And if you haven't explored yet, feel free! There's plenty of stuff to do besides the main quest. But here's the catch- since I let you beta testers play through this early, I would really appreciate it if I got some feedback/suggestions/questions/whatever. That's your guys' jobs, and you'll be in the credits that'll roll at the end if you give me good feedback. And you'll be provided with updates (this is only beta 1 out of a few).
If at any time you thought "wow, this looks amateur," I want to know where you thought that. My goal here is to make it look near-Bethesda quality, which is why it's taking so long.
Thanks for playing, hope to hear from you soon!
ESP.TRADUIT:
我到目前为止的故事就这样结束了。你正在做的任务（到达戈弗雷）还没有完成，所以不要费心去寻找老戈弗雷。主线任务中至少还有三个任务。下一个涉及您被瘟疫捕获，以及您决定加入他们或逃离设施。您收到的接下来的 2 个任务将基于该选择。 如果您还没有探索，请随意！除了主线任务外，还有很多事情要做。 但这里有一个问题——因为我让你们 beta 测试人员早点玩，如果我得到一些反馈/建议/问题/任何东西，我将非常感激。那是你们的工作，如果您给我良好的反馈，您将在最后滚动的学分中。并且您将获得更新（这只是少数几个中的 beta 1）。
如果您在任何时候都认为“哇，这看起来很业余”，我想知道您是怎么想的。我的目标是让它看起来接近贝塞斯达的质量，这就是为什么它需要这么长时间。
感谢您的参与，希望尽快收到您的来信！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has taught you that if running isn't an option, creeping around in the dark always is. You have received a permanent +5 boost to your Sneak skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这告诉你，如果跑步不是一种选择，那么在黑暗中爬行总是可以的。你的潜行技能获得了 +5 点永久提升。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be thankful that what has happened to Dr. Russell has not yet happened to you. Your Intelligence has permanently been increased by 1.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢发生在拉塞尔博士身上的事情还没有发生在你身上。你的智力永久增加 1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Russell's sickness sounds pretty bad. Your Endurance has permanently been increased by 1.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔医生的病听起来很糟糕。你的耐力永久增加 1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need a password to open the safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您需要密码才能打开保险箱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is nothing left to loot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么可以掠夺的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: New, explorable uptown areas coming soon in Alton DLC!
ESP.TRADUIT: 新的、可探索的住宅区即将在奥尔顿 DLC 中推出！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have killed 5 out of 20 Super Mutants in Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在老戈弗雷，你已经杀死了 5 个超级变种人中的 20 个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have killed 10 out of 20 Super Mutants in Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在老戈弗雷，你已经杀死了 10 个超级变种人中的 20 个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have killed 15 out of 20 Super Mutants in Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在老戈弗雷，你已经杀死了 15 个超级变种人中的 20 个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have killed all of the Super Mutants in Old Godfrey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经杀死了老戈弗雷的所有超级变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have the correct parts to fix the boiler. To do so, you'll need some scrap metal, two bottles of Wonderglue, and a lead pipe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您没有正确的零件来修理锅炉。为此，您需要一些废金属、两瓶 Wonderglue 和一根铅管。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations, you have completed Alton, IL's main quest. What you have experienced is the culmination of two and a half years of long, difficult years. Nevertheless, building this modification has been one of the most rewarding, entertaining, and most challenging experiences of my life.
Feel free to travel back and forth between Alton and DC at any time by using this truck. I'm sure you haven't completed, discovered, or explored everything in Alton, so get to it!
I truly hope you enjoyed playing through the game, and again, thanks to everybody for their time, support, and patience during the long road to completion.
Sincerely, Elijah Houck
ESP.TRADUIT:
恭喜，您已完成伊利诺伊州奥尔顿的主要任务。你所经历的是两年半漫长而艰难的岁月的高潮。尽管如此，构建这种修改一直是我一生中最有价值、最有趣和最具挑战性的经历之一。
使用这辆卡车，您可以随时在奥尔顿和华盛顿特区之间来回穿梭。我敢肯定你还没有完成、发现或探索奥尔顿的一切，所以开始吧！
我真的希望你喜欢玩这个游戏，再次感谢大家在漫长的完成过程中付出的时间、支持和耐心。
真挚地， 以利亚霍克

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH MAH GAWD ITS OVER! ENDING VIDEOOOO!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪，它结束了！结束视频！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be on the lookout for "An Unusual Request", a mysterious DLC coming to Alton soon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请留意“一个不寻常的请求”，这是一个即将登陆奥尔顿的神秘 DLC！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The decision you are about to make will determine the faction you side with for the rest of your stay in Alton. Once you have sided with a faction, there's no going back.
And remember, the factions in Alton aren't as black and white as you may believe.
Choose wisely.
(Your game has been autosaved at this point should you change your mind later and decide to travel down a different path. Save scumming prick.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
您即将做出的决定将决定您在奥尔顿的剩余时间里支持的派系。一旦你站在一个派系一边，就没有回头路了。
请记住，奥尔顿的派系并不像你想象的那样非黑即白。
做出明智的选择。
（如果您稍后改变主意并决定沿着不同的路径前进，此时您的游戏已自动保存。保存渣滓。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dulles Outcast Signal Bravo lost. Data received, no errors. Decoding transmission...
ESP.TRADUIT: Dulles Outcast Signal Bravo 丢失。数据收到，没有错误。解码传输...
设备已添加到您的库存中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't forget to grab your stuff from the locker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了从储物柜里拿东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A group of remnants from that ever-present thorn-in-my-side Underground Railroad has been spotted far to the east, on the outskirts of Alton. They were spotted around an old gas station, Last Chance Gas. If somebody can take them out, come see me in my office and claim your reward.
Stephen Clark
ESP.TRADUIT:
在奥尔顿郊区的东边，人们发现了那条永远存在的刺在我身边的地下铁路的残余物。他们被发现在一个旧加油站 Last Chance Gas 附近。如果有人能把它们拿出来，就来我办公室找我，索取你的奖励。
斯蒂芬克拉克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Just got word that a group of Plague Remnants has been spotted not too far from here. They're located on the edge of downtown Alton, just east of the crater. If anybody manages to wipe them out, find me to claim your reward.
Here's to hoping that we can all sleep easy,
Tom Howard
ESP.TRADUIT:
刚刚得到消息，在离这里不远的地方发现了一群瘟疫遗迹。它们位于奥尔顿市中心的边缘，就在火山口的东边。如果有人设法消灭他们，找我领取你的奖励。
在这里，希望我们都能睡得安稳，
汤姆霍华德

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door has no visible way to open it from the outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门没有从外面打开的可见方法。
伊利诺伊州奥尔顿内部构建 2.8.11

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Once you decide to make your journey to the west coast, there's no going back until you complete a playthrough of this mod's main quest.
Companions are NOT supported past this point. Don't even try to bring them. There may be consequences.
Also, ensure your Hardcore mode needs are met before boarding the plane to the west coast; this is going to be a long journey.
-Janitor Dave, 924 Creative Works
ESP.TRADUIT:
一旦你决定去西海岸旅行，在你完成这个模组的主要任务之前，你就没有回头路了。
在此之后不支持同伴。甚至不要试图带来它们。可能会有后果。
此外，在登上飞往西海岸的飞机之前，请确保满足您的硬核模式需求；这将是一段漫长的旅程。
- 看门人戴夫，924 创意作品

ESP.ORIGINAL: The curio cabinet appears to have been placed here to block the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 古玩柜似乎被放置在这里以挡住门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shove the cabinet out of the way.

The decision you are about to make will determine the faction you side with for the rest of your stay in Alton. Once you have sided with a faction, there's no going back.
And remember, the factions in Alton aren't as black and white as you may believe.
Choose wisely.
(Your game has been autosaved at this point should you change your mind later and decide to travel down a different path.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
您即将做出的决定将决定您在奥尔顿的剩余时间里支持的派系。一旦你站在一个派系一边，就没有回头路了。
请记住，奥尔顿的派系并不像你想象的那样非黑即白。
做出明智的选择。
（如果您稍后改变主意并决定走另一条路，您的游戏此时已自动保存。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please order weapons via the terminal.
The elderly man stands in the way of the pump. He appears to be deaf and unarmed, but you must kill him to make sure he will not blow your cover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老人挡住了水泵。他似乎是聋子，手无寸铁，但你必须杀了他，以确保他不会暴露你的掩护。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I need somebody to repair the water pump and boiler, it's got me stumped as to what's wrong with it. For those of you who don't work your asses off down in maintenance, just head down the tunnel, away from the station, and then through the utility door at the end of the tunnel.
Tom Howard
ESP.TRADUIT:
我需要有人来修理水泵和锅炉，这让我很困惑它出了什么问题。对于那些在维护中不努力工作的人，只需沿着隧道走，远离车站，然后穿过隧道尽头的公用门。
汤姆霍华德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I really need somebody to... I just need some help. Come see me by the station entrance, I should be at the stand.
Frank Randolph
ESP.TRADUIT:
我真的需要有人... 我只是需要一些帮助。到车站门口见我，我应该在站台。
弗兰克·伦道夫

ESP.ORIGINAL:
So rumor has it from Old Godfrey traders that there's a man who calls himself Obongwa that has a job for whoever is brave enough to come within a hundred yards of this weird old man. He claims he needs these three items-
1) Obongwa's "Spoon Fork." (which we can assume is a spork) 2) A hat he calls "The Party Pooper." 3) And his "Burnt Toast Toaster."
I couldn't make this stuff up. He lives in a cave smack dab in the middle of Deathclaw territory- just east of Belleview. I don't know how the Deathclaw haven't taken care of this guy by now- maybe they know he's too crazy to bother dealing with.
ESP.TRADUIT:
所以从老戈弗雷商人那里传出的传言说，有一个自称奥邦瓦的人有一份工作，只要有足够的勇气来到这个奇怪的老人一百码范围内。他声称他需要这三样东西——
1) Obongwa 的“勺叉”。 （我们可以假设它是一个叉子） 2) 一顶他称之为“The Party Pooper”的帽子。 3) 还有他的“烤面包机”。
我编不出来这些东西。他住在死亡爪领地中间的一个山洞里——就在贝尔维尤以东。我不知道死亡爪现在怎么还没照顾好这个家伙——也许他们知道他太疯狂了，懒得对付。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Well we don't get requests like this every day. Some of our traders caught wind of a guy who goes by the name of Obongwa (yeah, seriously) that needs one lucky fellow to retrieve a few of his items-
1) Obongwa's "Spoon Fork." (which we can assume is a spork) 2) A hat he calls "The Party Pooper." 3) And his "Burnt Toast Toaster."
Again, I'm completely serious. I couldn't make this stuff up if I tried. He lives in a cave smack dab in the middle of Deathclaw territory- just east of Belleview. I don't know how the Deathclaw haven't taken care of this guy by now- maybe they know he's too crazy to bother dealing with.
ESP.TRADUIT:
好吧，我们不会每天都收到这样的请求。我们的一些交易员听说一个名叫 Obongwa 的人（是的，说真的）需要一个幸运的人来取回他的一些物品-
1) Obongwa 的“勺叉”。 （我们可以假设它是一个叉子） 2) 一顶他称之为“The Party Pooper”的帽子。 3) 还有他的“烤面包机”。
再说一次，我是认真的。如果我尝试，我无法编造这些东西。他住在死亡爪领地中间的一个山洞里——就在贝尔维尤以东。我不知道死亡爪现在怎么还没照顾好这个家伙——也许他们知道他太疯狂了，懒得对付。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I need somebody to find my bastard of a husband and bring me the package of mine he has. I don't care HOW you get the package, I just need it. And don't open that package either- like I said, it's MINE. I'll know it you've tampered with it, believe me.
The coward is holed up somewhere in the South Godfrey metro tunnel. He ran off after a fight a few weeks ago, and hasn't bothered coming back. He probably knows I'll shoot his balls off if he does.
Linda Roberts
ESP.TRADUIT:
我需要有人找到我丈夫的私生子，并把他的包裹带给我。我不在乎你如何得到包裹，我只需要它。也不要打开那个包裹——就像我说的，它是我的。我会知道你已经篡改了它，相信我。
这个懦夫躲在南戈弗雷地铁隧道的某个地方。几个星期前，他在打架后跑掉了，再也没有费心回来。他可能知道如果他这样做我会把他的球射出去。
琳达·罗伯茨

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is sure to get a few laughs. A guy that goes by the name of 'Obongwa' claims to need assistance. New Godfrey traders told us that he wants somebody to retrieve three of his lost items-
1) Obongwa's "Spoon Fork." (which we can assume is a spork) 2) A hat he calls "The Party Pooper." 3) And his "Burnt Toast Toaster."
Yeah, seriously. He lives in a cave smack dab in the middle of Deathclaw territory- just east of Belleview. If you feel the need to test your shooting skills on a few Deathclaws, maybe you can head on over to his place and practice it a bit more. Or I guess you could find him his items. But honestly, which is more fun?
ESP.TRADUIT:
这肯定会引起一些笑声。一个名叫“Obongwa”的人声称需要帮助。新的戈弗雷交易员告诉我们，他希望有人找回他丢失的三件物品——
1) Obongwa 的“勺叉”。 （我们可以假设它是一个叉子） 2) 一顶他称之为“The Party Pooper”的帽子。 3) 还有他的“烤面包机”。
是的，认真的。他住在死亡爪领地中间的一个山洞里——就在贝尔维尤以东。如果你觉得有必要在几个死亡爪上测试你的射击技巧，也许你可以去他的地方多练习一下。或者我猜你可以找到他的物品。但老实说，哪个更有趣？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My name is David Hawthorne, and I really need some help. My brother has been missing for a couple of years now, and he's probably dead, I understand that. He was the adventurous type, and he knew every last corner of Alton. One week, he left town (this was when we were still in Old Godfrey) like usual, bags full of supplies, etc. The only problem was that he never came back.
All I'm asking for is some closure. He said he was heading out towards the old Hopp Hollow field... he wanted to see if he could harvest some corn seed. He always carried a toy car with him as good luck, it had been his favorite childhood toy. If you can find that and bring it back to me, I might be able to sleep a bit easier.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我的名字是大卫霍桑，我真的需要一些帮助。我的兄弟已经失踪几年了，他可能已经死了，我明白这一点。他是个喜欢冒险的人，他知道奥尔顿的每一个角落。一个星期，他像往常一样离开了小镇（那时我们还在老戈弗雷），袋子里装满了补给品等。唯一的问题是他再也没有回来过。
我所要求的只是一些关闭。他说他要去老霍普谷地……他想看看能不能收获一些玉米种子。他总是随身带着一辆玩具车，这是他儿时最喜欢的玩具。如果你能找到它并把它还给我，我可能会睡得更轻松一些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chose to fight for the Underground Railroad.
Arrived back in the Capital Wasteland.
Recovered all Doc Russell's notes across the Alton wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在奥尔顿荒地取回了罗素博士的所有笔记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Made the unplanned journey to Alton, Illinois.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进行了前往伊利诺伊州奥尔顿的计划外旅程。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chose to fight for the Plague.

ESP.TRADUIT: 野生特拉克 自行车
号避难所 - 安德克罗夫特
号避难所 - GECK 实验室
卡车到伊利诺伊州奥尔顿
